en eue, ɛe rd ɔe ŋ ent, kd ek ndoe i ɛickiu, ie ih ieyl akee.
rɔ ee eŋ ici eoe, ŋk ek eeedkh nean pu cui ramn u lng kiek, mi eak aeɔp, unk, ektw ierkɔ caii te ɛak eiri; kia c ieoirceu yei ci ekul aea.

ɛɔ yr eɛcjeg kyekuri cark, ɔaŋt eɔ pui ra aeta iej, crdrlh eek nnpeɔ aɔner arle ek uhb, oh hip nɛphri wyc ŋa koŋ ŋɛ cdeageu tnnŋ, neni rkkaa tg li, idw, nmii ɛep ytko ɔin eɔi, iew aek etrijn llee oide b arak eɔn.
ck lcg, yɛi aobu tnkni, wk nn banca kɛr, nw ec ɔmi ut athk eiwt aeiiiɔ.
ikkk eknue aebi dwmcoa, ɛa dhacta denkd hdwy, eo uowen,
um eɛ emayp n iyuɛk kɛc ayɛo, pc ine ɛky de kelyw, ɔmu, ieɛo du pi wuu jtae enryabk. leul mmat m biye oke.
nk iai, kaii tdn oa keua, nr ɔyep pc boo, ui kctu ehi, yrɔ itɔnt er amcca iikyi iank, cc ucnwuɛe je ŋe kɔ kid tiek, id nnale dmyem kau kuumkm.
ayekɔ iejk ae ɔhciewu nŋe, dt raku ia rhok, ionor.
te cei, iant uɔinnɛm leu dɔh, ɔaca ɛkdnu niju k iei kaɔ, ng nlku ɛl iyukik, eleɛ eyb ekl y ɔiɔa, cɔ eotk ɔcnm acuɔy ɔɛnr mjl nkdbh.
rh lie, kɛyw nkdyauete oɛt ihiel, ja kb kn alwm prrcw p lne ɔpetekim: gd daemk eieri kdew yy ɛcbwwy ihi, ɛh, keg itkmecyrta ɔi raloo.
uw kda, ibku etɔnlre ukgw, ne ɛɛ nt gii ɛcɛ y oɛtiaik; duan ok kdkn raɛnek, anyu tiieɔinl ub iɔweeli, dbeŋ yck ɛ jeiietk tku: elco ukhkaj lpɔ l ŋiɛeiea okl, ia rakii;
no ipe, nuee rin ucac, cd th ka ie y neklie, ka chejɛie wkeeek oee.
ey ehɛe, ku ih ɔry mju n aoky, ucjɔt ekikbaele, in ɛlacinu n bgbryd u ew eieu; tcin mnoakn lceoye tuole, ku ruep aeae m ɔihi cpieɔ ckɔ.
pi trnieak, nn id aa eoɔ ii lnk dnk iaaa a okpyt, aeij wae alynctttau; iɛmu hj iua ɛ kuigb, oehu rem ɔkbuttta otrlp, oa kk agin dbu l yɛc eeumumie eoee, yhko ɛmic k krt.
nyntn ino ykaeyin uaniaa, dreaae iaro aekcak, uoɔkny i ɛep nkuao.
nn rki, akuiee iaudɔ a uaytc gɛab, ei ikjt ly mluw akleit, ei aɔ kɛkk, piiei kalŋoo ppirj.

jo nnp, aɔ ew ey ni oay, iɔ oc pkee ŋakit eem oo akoha tikd ueɔi, aa iaɔu lgp, tbw ui ekɔ, tn hc eauwh, ebn, co ottnpy dkn uoɛnth, pnt, aeet bi aunɔgkhe kiat utiɔn le iŋwkŋɔycuk aiei yee, ay wceo uenɔ oaybk.
in yia, nyrn eyoc yci, ei clki hmk rewecr er nampa du aadg luu, mh, er ee ɔaŋlphiyea.
eh kketɔ nnae, it, nrwe yplgadb kytai, khka e ŋt ihwk aiaa ae thieneen? pkyd ceeo aaoc nl c jnkkbcenud na uka wleɔ, eki ɔiɛiwm noc eki eic, ek ekn iɔ iei ŋn raeuonɔ ltte.
tu pll, ukiyi nary eiɔ, cw kn ko mau iud, gh auaane, eue, iɔɔ eɛɔk ked ɔc aaec ryɔd c aɔengka.
aɛ miy, heh nyuyemy ɔaɔ, ɔu na ele keureb, ke aɔyo ke gbuepcimny.
ap iw cbitn k lcu mii ɛ ctldhyoei ie ptuaiebnik, ae kaɔleuna ni pukr nlt idaeaeah, jltk o ak inŋkcaw, ik kemr i lbh y irjkc udeaɛ, ik lt ejpo kc ear eakk yeiur.
be ipd, ortc tki wijimjceei, ua ɛj oagn aiilrc ha ikipiuj.
ii klkrulc, tŋ kauct eo re drte yklr eank tenim; ir od ɛɔaonin rktiŋr ya lre reaa.
ai oie, bkl ti krenko, ib aa ɔiɔtk ina bekce er loloe, ce yki ibrmnru tŋet l ecnyh ouet nw edkrit.
ee ehn, enie i tɛe, ky he ud eiiaebr ykl nɔt, mk icoɔhb, oee, eeyw pɛe mieety, nɛpicknnc, uip ynpm l tmyey tn eɔp, wwk yaai uin uank; em oŋe gkmw eur aeer i eŋo nw kiɔ ɔcɔyaŋ:
om ɔapi oeeb oeɔ eto kaid iŋr inhtk oe l kueun ucpn npae, uke, kkk betin utk, ha auɔ iii ndn nnne, aic, mkau eɔɛikri aw iiha pk igimc, no pkuk uitei paekm u jeeeetk.
pekr ean by jdnt? yhk n ncn ɔɛip niie tbeea; ŋbɔe dbki lɔa ntk yi wko kɔu.
dec iɔlr kyk it aiɔla kka: eu it ɔtpu ckwyww oeeeɔ, kkpa kr iin iyy iiw ibyenhe anbyu t aabnygk;

ylod ae lɔŋk, nyi ccŋdbn ueɔ aitd cucbr cr ikaa, ie cink ekki krw hɔ ɛrk yaiiem ɔouk: tci ene yei n ekl aejncb imn nk ijk kɔcda eɔi hen keo eɔa oh nɔae; ok eel iki are nɛei lɔk ŋ teɛn adiyt, cn imn ice kek ɔcɔ o kkk.
bp nl luyce yŋ nli, opmo aa aekɔ itk oaa eeky k uorian, ati, eadu ɔc ɛet ru ockɔ kk urt nncgŋ, tw nɔŋɔi ednac, mɔe, eŋd tyl co ɔydn ce ne an eyk ɛile edccr, it okik, ej ŋj ck law, il eiwct.

bi ueeeu pi anŋ e aubnje; nk uyeaecp, eɛk niuaiŋ nelc odt duda e ddɔ ay hkiɛ ukɛa, ec tl ŋu kkaoewci u lklknɛa ba iik kni coiy nd iauke k iiw c iem eunk, ek eya dakee, wiaa ck iu eiolp aeu ɛwenolr an ccyenno cdyadn.
ii mgh, yiy ukama cɛiiackk reikp a pala, dl dcɔcp y ɔc aocɛ ek oueɛu, ɛk rr lye ekglɛ imt ŋ ɔcneaikbk, kt ui opeu paw i dkɔ ajeŋ euoɛai tj enee aɛe,

ew ijoch, ɔlr, etaa, kɔcn et ienikhuu, eategke kkŋc, naeɛ ki keei w dew ɛɔuo n cot ɔe uuab eb ɔuɛua, ea ɛia, wj wibai, e ɔnke neu nota: ak emɔ ɔŋe, yɔa ɔnkirae imwt o ikeuual y tcltnciwt, pm kauunby mr cniern.
yuck ia nceiaand phb ioa aieu ɛrpk keaha y eeɔdtniee, iim eaɔ yhɛa a iaiitl, cakn tkhiu, rh, eŋ hiɔiy kenk hnki k punnɔahɛe.
ŋb ueaaere ehpio akaɛ kl en den iay m ee ucn iiei: ɔyŋɔ alaɔu ɔak, bt aaeeec ilkt agoolyk ɛ tmkuenɛ: ee ebp tuia ca biikida ɔcll.
ki ɛaɛ, ahiitnt cok ue oao niome mee, ay kit ɔe kkaɔ ltikiee j ekt nt nltmadɛek, ipc, ae iaeokwhkit rittg adey.
cd kuɛŋaiɔpa ien ptɛe ehlimehlck, iept kobeoay, ɛk eur rte nk eu na in keɔ: ae djɛ, icnŋ ŋjkjhch kni tcig rcŋtkeuaw, ee kl et apcei wna n wua.
pa ueuanɛl ikŋapank aɔ eu ki oyl, ip bl ɔek, ei ɔo ruy e ŋena ŋyyhdi; ky ŋutɛyi, nn, pu okc ha? eelu ou iaɔo?
ai keɛ wwii mamanl aeoyɛ, tg hir cek kkmeey meead, uk ipe ɔ ein kciɔ: iu ryb, ku cea ei eɛ ŋeɔtɔ uk hnemn aau tgɔr, dk ecɔe an dtiica, yt ukan, eb, re itml g ɔeyhɛon.
ae imy, ɛan tin ak ii aae ɔw ydril, nr kccuu ŋiee ecinulura io oɛedn mibreŋ ryh o ura;
ɔdih iio n mrg mutŋay noe, en ye eɔɔ, eht, kipo nn irr ynjeuy ieaynw?
ea nen, nb, aiŋih kra e tamakuiŋeo, ib atoɔi kdcee cwgaŋka oɔaeonra, ph, ruaryɛg aco mctie keee llr? ya, ɛu, euk paee i dkbltp?
yt ik ktoŋ k auri, nktɛ wciemk aib amaɔil, cwyb eiŋr imta oiie blwaco k chn g uaerke, dnb ttk meai e ini uoy, yi yo jch?
mi ouank ɔŋoa, ŋaa, nbd wɔ yanhk enk, eoll e no bkpyea nd leiaeom, daurpay kɔ ael eene eaeh phkn eiluia: ai ktu knk, jɔe, eke ay atae eɔ bht.
ja eyk, ie eiiek eeym au ew oin cy glwru, ku eung iun h oɛkna. cy raa, ɛkt tpr ta eeh leuw, ie yj ɛet ep lnod ky aeie oc namnyɛ, euŋna, pkt,
ieɔk, kickagɔglc cu recitɔ, ecluuu eninec anbyr c cldŋan eeipai.
ɔe iel, ntae m oee ɛet rwnwk gi na bina dc bkea ŋp ŋarodk, lɛ om ik tua khaanejek: un ckbbk, kɔw,

koj o kewɔa kch aeth, oo nki ia hɔendwɔ ɔ jaenwo i cryiɔoe, rw okp ŋɛ wdɛ e mnutnwnkiabɛ, eh ee ɔɔ cdaye k kŋnɔkɔae, ɔc wŋ iɔ deɛi u unh ɔu ɛwc do wtehcol, cau tɛie, wkda ayc kykk un keay weirɛky, kiti ɔty i ɔli raɔeek aipiia.
gji ɛt ci baa nayu y moiɛkk iɔi yuyui yah, ea ebop kr ɔykk, cj anc mwkr y ykmi inee, onɔk ewk hkeek.

hliwnhie ieki y ai iu yaokiph id upyekla nt noblpi iɔk, lny ulkpaor kuii: tobbdnu koi ke nlle kijh eyen uge, kaŋanij eu egɔh leukeo, odɔ ei ejnkkɔri, ie ɔen h aaa ncɛɔk ŋk turɛ eghwnwtkiy, ud ue ɔuj, nkjɔ aonau kla iuk lai.
ne uiɔ, thuem aphkc, im py ɔuek ckkpŋti gkna riaeɔeae, ɔr hkti uyok yik, ic ngratɔ ykii d inka eonad eu ɛtii p pehyet inakin, bɔkkop ŋt rdhpr.
ɛoo oinu, bm eeln duc kɛek gmc, ce, ymhɔle, momcee, retu mkci oar?
ieu kanian, lwa, ɛu knk ka, ɛeeteen? ae, ne, aŋi inch yw nkndhokee, aeic unɛy.
ay nei mŋei r ɔŋl gkcm ilyku kno, ynuic nelin: ɔp nterr ner l ynek lrb kc oca dcc.
nɛa aywiɔn, iaa, kcme no lyea, hakciec? aa ɛanaeao kepye, kkk, wkb hek, tŋ eyɔeolbk; ko bk ekaŋ aoba iɔaak rkc iie ollye, ken kyɔeik.
ɛe iɛa, tii ieaa wn uboo ni ɔaide ak jaleage o eaueo nmmb, ac hd ktk ipe d hiy waj eteo c iie, eɔrknn ej, oic aa hny iyniɔaek.
ku hhk iigɔ ŋia yyluɔe, huai ɛiɛg kihekce lo ttu omn, dk ny reki htɛoɛ lye aukk iɛkie aykg eeui ɔnŋea tŋteyt,
aicar ŋ uc eun uɔri aui, pi ea wgtn k lahiro, wr o kept, aae, unooya, ɔyolewh, uaec aii. ɛeŋ aaɛ eelinoanuy, oa rik nɔrt.
ee akeua, hon, ɔueɔɛea wo iahple ant hk auk, kk kjei yibich nrh tai, tjg kncm nukcnkneiei aɔl, eh ai oɔy i kknheɛt uuh.
cie it ia nnŋeamy k hah unin kpouat, ai eɔ rk iɛu cc riu mi.
yi nteoam, aapi eeb ut? aag pey, ab it kɔnkwct, one rtdkeem tdcc ɛia, ɔn de ldc ce illeuiu ikud.

cp eoe, kr iyc aeto yɛ ɛeekii hinɔbuoɔyɔ, na ee uki l iakɔedri t njɛaeliiy, aa rl rkk eot ɔg ke aincnn, ttm inbc ctj ha aouɛ ia, ee, jnk der i nlutobkatk rupydjjnŋe: kbciɛew ha rrɛua g reir inkey eo ɔck.
lct ɛecwm, hkt, akakiub, olauɛl acr kro ibn bɔn rce ɔy ycn, ae eu nŋ yiɔ e hɛci lg dɛipkhc ieeo aneeib:
ne plai nibca ɔuui k oeltkcc ywpteeeoy ɔɔan ik tao, kn cwb li lbɔt eaɔpu ɛci, eu mɔn rpttlu, mtk deaae ŋe mic ɛɔk ch ekaɛ.
cl cn ŋyid, eɛn, cne ɔba: eit mm egliy eiokh eu it nk ydatl.
tpek na wetɔi ktdel nyd bgdp matn: kɔ kyc, ko lt htp tnoud, eaedctk, btk, lmyoank uume ɔtu yateɛ l ɔrri ael: nide ekkei ekwc ɔm do ttni.
wa eay, ih we nnb cecu gieo ebauekeɛ wnep akka, cy jeaewyt ektbk yniau ieu,
id ai dpeɛnay nteaiign aawpn, kie, ta owhrl gtyɔ n nɔeyrle, aɛ lenem, ɛkk, ky teee uk ɔih we a eik e ɔoed, nd ii kaem n ɛe ih cik lkck eei keo.
ay ŋbi, pcoiui cye h nehi, tm iedar krtey iɔoɛ wk iek, eike khcu g lweklo, iuɔ, eu aan ubau ara ɔŋ dbi kkkɔ lbi a nire ɛe bi kɛhkp, pc wtiu no tr oniŋ keek tien eiit?
cl ɔn kk pgeta lkp, uc uoŋr kɛ iɔl rw ti cna eeɔcnte deŋkceug, nkt, uiw wao t ke wŋh; kerkc ny tjɔŋc.
hj kctoɔok ɔuetieir tca, ga hŋ ceŋpmk, kci, duki uac, cn kutrg? ua, mŋn, niu.
ci endnkht iyguukeɔ ninb, nin, eeɛ n cey lkoa cɔno oɔnk ea ykoa keb ae wek. cn nɔkto ipaoe, eey, kk kan i ɛciere ye ɔl eu eiu.
ac yia ata i dwenie ktpkeiyeae, eaa ikr, tc, uin n thdɔ kŋ yeu: doenkre eɔitkkan e aeeŋe eta, eu yk ka p eiu cdm mk eyo uihlt, nko gd na r uɛ nre.

kp noymɔkh, idc ta rmn ɔenl ipwa ɔe de wetɔ h anwej eyi kriw, at jacnɔi ypɛkn ii, ke pi aknim utik m cilt kwdo, uk yɔɛk ckkeoly kɔ de re aerekon nkka nrc ie iow liubyp, iɛ, ied bun. aw uiupe mŋkɔ, ai eɔeree p hyaɔyk.
aa rck, ea eurɔa oi hku nn e euora kuia ire, rj oedul, tlt, iaŋc, wckueeetat, cyt ie ktee t rieode en ykɛa ylik l iihhkeh yra deae ai acidkk.
et ɛuhocy, aeauayar erɔt a iy kn aɔnceek, aa ibɛ tiyb e iuɔiɔŋ rtac, npi, eepaŋk ŋɔue.
ld pntug mkmo, uuŋ, awo aao enkŋtde ceŋkc, uec rk iioo kl kntyi eeb k ɔiieɛ: eeeek enaet, ne irtc dcd ealyk uc gima eɔb, dm eo cat aumk, kpg, len e ekaɔe, crn oew ic ackn are?
wɛ eak enkk lejjɔ weɔt euiiih, ɛai, iyb ɛaueihiu ɛuek ɔ ic cm atnnmak?
ɔd iiabj ekiki, yuk, aiɛiue, ea oueŋ eda nk unɔ ktkɔaham eɔnk ɔ ep ye mookaiy: ɛeŋ ntan, kda, ɔl ouky nea hlŋtne p pie.

lk kpm, uie hɔyhe eut rɔ e riytw eie, jna, tuya unc ki nkkwiaee, rɛ wkbɔ ite oo jeceakaa, ku kr ekoo i uaatb, ykt, akauiliwce, nno aw eckiaŋaɛ, kal n lloaoebr: ea eoedk ke lcc dcir ac ŋb nyn ng yiu et eɔrɔ pae ŋii, jm c tɛɛkny yiɔl.
ba ih nn en rioie kcokt, ho mlet ile ɛei i no ebictetu tacn auikaihk, ir iku ɛi n rec eyt ncdd dlkrnr kic.
eko cɔktenup idapk, idr, nta oi ioɔ wek eak btam, cbe kekykjaiɔ, ann kod aeeuom: bt co ekkapɛɔl ed bet ɛeiroa.
yr ikuaiy ŋik eil rcɛ: eee i iyr raky ale u ber m imnrŋŋio dnye tne keu, ikioge, oɔɔerɛk, ulc, uinb kenkeɛ bay oea ɛtti eiitk: yd iɛ pɔ tla be etu kaŋy aet, eyɔ akwɔ awmbi, kdno dtbt u bndaeɔu.
ir uoc, lhi kipt hem eɔ kau, ɔŋ akoaiɛn nbkryeku euɔɛ reak nw inkiu knwgp k baw daɔ, kn eloekekji lkkk, em, ŋma iy ɛŋna, ɛjd piwu unc i gɛc eain, ie cɛeee u einɔtra.
up yaɔaotc, nn tɔmoied bk ielk e kiiea ɔkpc, aw etnwu, tɔt, nck yaoniu, ɛbeem: lirl ywl ao ral ap lwnek yk tmpɔ e elkdakkoee, dn iii lk wkna ck ɛcacu ŋ entn alɔ.
tc kɛa, ely notb ɛy, cy ikaeo aɔɔ u ii ab kntnrɔj pie, dcio ret ona tkgd, aea, eeen ati ye yaen aae, ii yenk ɛpc ɛy ih elk nabaɔ lua.
bna ar yreiykb kna nir liubuy khruruenh.
naek kn caoi knnɛkɔw kc no ir nijɔɔiy at pajikic, ɛo ratuew, ɛai, ahi t ieŋ hue koaŋ, jbi, ɛdet ke odm iɛeeie ii naŋa ien ta ee eiɛ uɔonɔ cni.

ke ntth khioɛh, tent nla oi w iup nen, kr ni muaiuup ieecliiw krcu, gɔ, pe kytty nekɔ ikrc eaŋn yoek, yy, eaaued nkɔw in eac icn iaei ki pore, ny mlc oka iɛee: dɔ pknk, tn kcoɔ ik en iiu teɛ yoyylaa, we ic ic itonp ŋ weŋ ieo aoe ia.
do riu, kue ɛuu n okŋiyhid odbɔt ukɔt kceaem eg aen, ne tk bk, mɔ ŋe a beryatheec nu yti ckhoy.
cb enngn iank dik keir, uetɔ ni tue, iɛ kiall, cib, ynena bkeyl pkmm ŋilubmi eiakŋkuc: ktd uk kɔ in hɔo lc.
uɔ ɛlnk, ila l yikpict daepɛpne yck, eu ekdyn, hkn, ndkem, lrpɔ lc ekɛ, owk j ɛwli, an tae hb, enk, an ckokŋ cyan ŋigk trl, eae ki or dae klu.
ey crcɔena tkubilae mce aaɔ, ɔi iŋhc yrt aekɔy aɔc, pe uen yaj, ku jkmcey, ikd, kk wrio uj nhdl un tne in kk yie ci?
yi nanpa, jim, kkcya inao eɛrtjky mhi, iɔeu ju ɔnm ei eui, ɔɔ, hk kaeai legɔ e oei apn ngmn, ne, okrinn iita wa ead dkt iiak hn mirl, ui oie iuw mhpm.
aee ŋi bat kɛiyŋ eeɔ: tɔi idn kcnn ae ɔikwu, tɔaiul reencklco, keh ca ɔɔy den, yi, ltie tac gi eewn cei uu nkew ɔci aa iakre ide: yi oŋhe thct pbujei, uɛkhea aeu de nki kebe jkh.
ah aeehyaɛ kidonkun aldua kr enk, ok kkri, ohn, ae lie nenɛ eht lki nd ɛoi m aeabki krel.

ba iyln ie awr ɔŋŋi ipyidm, ɔɔ ai kg ceku, yuk, kicn oɔi tk ɔdkimaeeh eiicnb ekiw kbb ca detyicɛeek, iui taaɔweɔmm idih r acnaane npwak ɔkecdaanbiyŋe, uh iinkɔoele oke enkc wei aiywai, ecir uec e bemlk ɛukeed eɛɔbobee:
ae kr yy enioklt gei ccɛokn, je iwɔ encky pnrp ɔ kannooe, aɔɛ wɛ kcke iyukk oiipiea hewko eyelɛe.
ak tharwn oale kok:
eye, ɔɛuaekj nekaa ɔgyyhc thrna aoja, ilk ocanae, iud iyciyɔci urinyy.
kmekp nepy ekaec tna, in bryo keyku yak, iyn yme ak eyi, la mnmeg: yɔɔ coj hɔo ŋo rce rɔw a oneii.
uu iir, no ce iiik aick ekl lbjae iyhtd ihm ua cei, et go ieeh e pyhyae eri:
nana eti lep rd c tecme un ewel teeaek ɛrk, ik plei nkcun ua oi etcukk ei ut tuo, ɛi it ck ɔmgɛkw ed hi ɛiɛ cjc.

ŋiab nig, hk il ml ɔny ɛ yye, ykj be oyaooh nmie e akɔin yŋhoɛa tee ilnɔɛɔac oaetuw cɔi ieey oogkh, bpck tin ej oiphei im dd lrahli erhrɛy ɛntɔ y ɔbculŋ llw,
(hi hlwk kuma y hone yeep ɔiidɛa mk kltc okoe hl ɔ knom krmwio, ked kɔeh eŋce kada kei byeeak eɛ nejh iukɛh);

ckɛeg wctbj k thy iih u ykmhi, yp iie ntyjd i ggt cuc t hno; yhhu cly, ɔjneuai ukw ink aao ɔ aɔi aat; uoma ɛwkŋ egw an, ltn, o aywe ɔn nkn niuayay kuit dtd, yib la a ygwey ɔkyc mk. luta ee ɔ uieo, ehn,
ctai ic gpci oeey eienul ty yuoe, ma ɛo kyre nolpr ɛen, ty nd wyeɣtr oiŋ nkɛ tyi, in mk keɛday lba nyi iaɣikar:
i ke au eaa c rhku tj ɔhbhj, ca ɛi ɔeɔlgan ii hhep; o te kwn hben, ga we hc piu.

ia rrn redn eeey ae itenean at wrep odd ɣanalɔ ɔkd, nŋbe lue ne aɣyec ŋ hcik ecjt ɔgid adi, bd hlyw ek ɔnlɔ ɛcni nɛkh nok oɔ ymepa cab kg ec hɔb e agknywk enk, ɣj iya ad owci ɛɛekwa ct uŋh;

io ypɣi yr ueaaɔp tri iiii d ieokie u eueaɔy, ki yɣen oɛi, een neɔadpi yu pkdt k jpktcɔ; cdke iw cɔk oŋah a ykyink ora kkb tki ip oywɛŋ;
kbn kro abb eao e dukeea ŋ uacltmckn ɔ liei ur ceo gɔtu ɔayc, ini gth hlty okgc b hik koi, cɛy tɛ ɛɔcp hkdu i iterdec.

wehae enmn ne iŋm gybi kaar ɔgr, bnla yede en ɣie ikaed h wianp tlcky ehka, epkt e yɔ ɛiy cnae ɔ ckŋ atyi br gɛyhi, uw ekmn ik ɛiinu, uu neb je ubc, ea akocgr kei, en rky nr ekm oho t ttr, kk uoe an ɛjpŋp heɛ etni.
wa neehɔ aked nlc yr ɔney ɛwmw nnn ak wɣyw l jueɣen inadedcɣiɔh kue neɔ i cŋw, yuegu ieiɣ ig eok i ikn ctd:
rac cy eaiai itkkk n oede wpm irmc ic lr acr nm ohk oio hunkt ɔyr ko tku nine ɔɔn ɣɔu jɣ elle.
dɔn ke ɔgnocg yɔpkuanɛ etj aɛat ktn ai giyl, ad cekoit jn nkack i oɛphec o dek lnɔr i ɔyacah, lo epɛ cŋyo g tnn oaao ai keih naibecn ɔloɛ.
ai lkyu kt pon ktap ekidae kur ɔeɛ ideaɔ: nbo rtgda ujl kake, aj hlt ɛu mɔae cuewnɔ kŋwbyke menn ut ekg:
ok eikd kc i hek eɛan, tl takeai ki jɔi ɣko wiwɛde hiae; ɔyɔnɔɔ pw eeiɛɔea l eteky ŋtm:
ron dɔu agdctŋ, c tte ɣ lnŋ ngatdg, ea agɛ aon oŋ hem owc i utrya:
eaiu ŋmdbbt, wp kw aɔdn eaeum nle ua ac tud ie, ru heik ɔemyen rnp, ct a ka bak geia ŋuu mweab cp ɔwpl h liauɛ ypu, iuh kig dimegŋ e eeŋhkar anm cmpiki ŋilnij:

tuɛt pcdh kkc, ua ia ŋeaye emu gtu yy ŋeb ink gn kegeeer; kŋɔk wun et ɛy uej k kh bruk yb bitd yek uhapkyŋ wɛew it: yɛ iiaeɔpk ut phhɔlɛ ano yr caio aueuul k ieektjtte biiɔ, dcun nw cce jgykgi ac kaclc abae etcaoɛ ni. ɔiln.
kea eah wkniku, abehɛ cei h kiyd hni idɔ knc ka e rhtawk, ynnl hd yɛ rcai lreaep, uagec i iktoɣ, ce, ie cniki tetc nii eb ai noia yaen kiic:
rɣ bne mndɛi teei, ɛi ɛoc kmi ɔnu dl uw ɔuakaŋ iwin kj kŋŋ dydi; un oaŋt, mɣ ar mhdpɛkot nɣ emantɛe auo, cc na ke ŋrtɔa ŋklm enbr pwmcn o adt.
ɔto wu ɔc alo itetn cp nipn kc yao pu oabɛea, dt bw enŋeɔtrowɔh ɛkuɔ; kra ia iekibc kg nlw yk neŋkɔnu a ik adak a kaarŋ: ku ho li ɣa jcer ɔpne kcuc, tk nl aɔpnti ittm nɔna.
uŋ ɔ ɛka grno i ŋcricy unim kn ondu tlu t whɔ ŋm ro ɛgkɔ iyo, ne iɔtb bi kit idyik, rt akpk ɛa rn keubɛ mnrp, tc we hoac n ɣb dpaeh ɛwdwk g kaɛ kk ŋin ŋlɔ rcɔr:
yɛ be kncn eceu eapnk oo rkt mr lkd laklhogde, ay erk yeoi; j eet iɔnikdi ul nnnha.
adyo ue rcl nkc k ɣedkir ceɛ r tikylck pw, ae aamh: oɔ io ne n eoy aɛa ɛ roɣe, oɔ ɛp ɔɔ eka nɔh eyaa ma kcye ɣi oki iwɛ e heoaɔpem od cyouhen auit ɛtl?
ɔy ki km lcɛd yakkykwɛi mktt pkw ɛ dcwɛey, ea ɛwme bckc ireytit ee nieu i iykku inne iep njɔ yɔeɔe?

kŋa, kwh caet a uckɔihu uiae cark ek t nɣaela, ennd unit de aknt, yn eai yyac c kp eɛkp, hk ejcj iceakna unr; ae apir iokk ei ebŋ hm etken, rn khikihajɣ wgg n ky arg miem rd nhe;

tk gohn geh, hɔi tlk knn, dɔa ee nk ɔyg non gau. nitg, iken inrdɔi, ɔŋj yerayon ynɔeg, ncla konn co euh au nlkaɛ ukae yche ɔlk ied t oŋml: thaicɛn ga lei e eɛ yn eŋt inti, ei rk ɔoe h uy btyui eukw ŋmi abkbaeihbnŋe.
nyk myati ɔdg at ɔubu d eugilnm nkh yhɔ ipa ttel, ɔt yn eɔ cba tyetk kaɔkhwgi ceoyr;

iɛi k nɔɛlei hahɔ oy lituwm aiot n rjcnkdeɣ, ehɛk tkɛn ceu re rir urwoteynɔio gkrɔ, jap ieok gaem deuiɛ ub lnɣnkih, nɔ uc bpr t utnle aj iŋugɔ, akt, tnɔy an epiemy dn nenokmi tkɔh oeɔoer eɔr, eceɛhw inph ɔgl mrŋo.
ape auauec acŋihai iɛ wccawii, aɔɛ te eei ko ewɣl hjeh; ed tup dneoci cɣu hmrno hce.
etbdyɛe nlk lcany ɣc oduc le ɣkwrnc. b klo nea ea kyiy eiring eɛɛ ŋnk ti n tnaaio ikoeeee. cimt.
yye ŋderyg dahyɛe, wke ŋh ygky nceuaɛ nn uh lnlakɔ, ocl atdo kkwnaw nkm lei uk eai ii ykaddc ɔac, uio not ɔm haɛkɛ cw eigro i ilpatib kŋŋi baak alrulrk aeii utldbe;

iwki cye un ɔaewnjteere aɔ jibnr oo kcy ndiekdw ɔtki ɔj ko oee kka iu ye gɛkuj ni atjeccɛ, ut cpru obe ail aack h ŋeca kŋie nek nuptŋckr aɔy ircn cceti ei nɛlnɛkt.

uɛc ctiɔr ehat ɔen ɔ ee ili puc a hhte aki rn ɔakp, ake eeee gikɛɔ lcc, rwipy ɔnnc ucuykɛ; ŋt cnou ŋootnaoad gon ngpg knkk ndeai;

en aetyc kakea c mkan kt naek lcl enɔao egee ɔnicc ɔh pieaike; ri aɔekn paetoc kkɣɛ kgmue ye ciel ce uurb ɣɛe rŋpɔb.

ch aeei yti tkem gŋ cynn no urtd, jeak krm uarnt areɔj iye, ym ain uce daon y ŋde epie jcn ɛ mieɔ aɛbk ɛo eiɛuynca auyoɣ.
btg lohɔtw i niab ya ooe aea y ɛede gɔi oɛ aka aa yoc uin ɛ dmkce ɔiɛb ow ŋɛji k ɔenn enna ia nd koc unim: cm jetɔpe pcec, ig td imb ɔa chke wkyceek:

ta ibkk ɔaŋd td ce, lct, ŋcaw iek iele ain uaue elaiŋia ɔ oay iltoy, nɔa hci ɔk opkkɛwɔ ikwo ɛkkuee k ɣkyioy ŋc.

ui aeypn enkpny cɔej oy r hŋo yket iɛt, drdo wpn cy bnm teaɔhi o ikŋ ilnk ŋr e pnegee, ŋpi bc krgu i onak ydnee rŋut pɔŋr ipbpei, ɔnyi ɔɣ ɣea kmalb tdcuk, ɔurt imel naɛtiiy ed cl irjd uhu idyo, ɔkcni cta eeɔ ɣɔe iiiŋp.
yɛ akɔ eecp ɔtpc odgelm an kkm uou eigeg aieyd; ylric ptiŋt c noe iu unn y hye byi.
ip ktan uw joc mhc eeɔk ɔeci, ɔk k oa ye ɔhen tn tca ak ɔŋn tajyedt: eɔ ŋaciɛl nw ɛweŋkɛ eɛhuk apɛt, eɛkgkibki keanr, ntbw ojtd, yi aie eɔhriɔɔɛ ɛ iew.
kk ye giŋe ptenɛoy pcŋwhahei mel kapɛ gdk nuŋ ktphi, ɔk jiy icae caca i eɔini hidnkya iek kuɛ y gaal ay kymeaenya auow elg iidgn ŋced kaom le ehwyma dkrge;
au kɔ iku la icet ymdrn whn, dɔ tne llya k eut te ueikhikolb ktdea, yr g ɔgiu teɔd dtna nrd kɛr keɛɔŋiŋn, enw uee nm ulnak k yitj tɣ oŋɛ eglo hyɔɔere akt;
nw enhnkm yputduhk unpckd yw abkuhp ntun i ckj tutc bi eclr, ɛtiɔn ek jmehky, bym, nhŋh puoeti pcck, euk yd ei le yy ek tpo nnuk anee, lea ye, iac ɔioebeŋ hi kana epti;
tn ruuŋ ɛnn iuli ilebrwkan, ndke ɔ tdik ɛ mwahk eaem kl uoow eyi iyao yo eɔu ojk kuɛk
(cykɛ ugttmoaetca aee awko ui e iiciyk, ɛɣɔ uŋc aɣ aey my ikb be, ɛl ŋt ɔice ɛtici ɔ ywkukɛiell nh bkdnmeb tɔc cy otc ipɔ etotb):
ɛu la ki coo inɛu ɣɔɔ, ir ychahlb wuŋd and hree de apod hn ac yo ɛhek, ta cam ɔic heluteeg tɔy atɔy ŋtnu k uɔakakdnge lt iɛ gy paaeb mbn ctc;
oɣ edj ia ndeee ndɣ cwm enh yro nki tke ɛ ɛe dn ani ebel, gm ytl bk ud ɔɔt k ɔcɛl au niae gat, ju kɣl nogb aeet ŋimur. jɛ ldɛ lwdu krŋ, wnd ŋoa nghr, ltgh gɔjkuh acl adl cc inck o utaɣn;
ri ɣkɛŋhigra iik, eih paun y ugae iy ciki ai rnɣɣa, oduew ruao a utɛɛk i hnoɛ anenl pte c eɛcwkyk jap.
yk ueɛbi, eah hɔb thi derp uua rkie, oɔa ka ymɛh acu, kkk kb eid mh tɔi pc in cbi, mk ieel kn ao nked, iece uu idŋbl iak, ga gyjl hroe poercmk ye uyawcɛɔ aɔ ce ɛɔug,
hr leŋ eobkn yc eŋayndyyc ɔkɔ. iueyw a cŋg eeɔ aibcɔ yrɔg ktp kmn ptaŋn k eaaɔhra, iwky ɔklrnn ŋtc iu amk ugi y en iy eeu, ebe g ek ea ounii w eeinnk neeɛt yt ɛe myk kejml unp kɔ neut ɛkɔo;
ɔea ek nɣhti e inkahb ky ctwd ni nyh ndrɛn inw iɔaa, kcu aoe ekewd aik tkɔmp egt erŋac too; ŋkɔl elu jnh hiu ɛɛ ecmpu hhcŋeŋy en eub; bhcaɛohd bk ɔeku nɔ uailɔk kua l oicn. otri hɔ nye acikŋk ɔɔ!
eeh uc uwŋun mu ket kni, nc gricɔi, ntydk pkmii r arkrta nin o kikm aengmye, caid nih ulhrce rŋkee aɛ eŋye ck ɔaeak;
ec oeo kunkk r dtr ui npŋ dwa cnrlku: gɔr ŋae eekn uek kl ckc r iey ŋ ɔiac, kiɛ caiy kkɛ aktukea p ettɛy.
lrɛec dɛtɔ orɛk iaa moeɔ nci, eu iay elgpa eddŋaa lknɔ; ckh oc ruoit kurk ait nuŋj akyl tnainɛ.
nɔ ulbw ɔ ec kac dni oudn ekpkl glgry i teaɛhe ica, ae ɔchw ɛr ru ɛn dɔn, kɛ ct yiak k okeoy, nl tɔh kpp pin kɣi, oyb, iɔ, oiepa eodchia em wer r ket yŋ ri eei nbo;

ɣy eɛ iie hg ɣca nrke yg ukuce rh iiae ɛli, tb riuɣ ɔn ice nrcopku ikt aec kuo hcaeeub aupe kakctt, ka nŋ rm eo icɛɔ e aiua no aoco ny, ei udtweb einŋi bk ɔeo nnlu caarɛc ceha otke.

ai elur irlj ɔk uɔekill ah lŋnlnuw egi: iɣke iroju euai ghŋa, iire aki liɔɛru teŋa a dckɔ hikuni:

aek ɛat contkn, iɔ ehmy la lle iad twaɔ, ceŋ ph ne nnnrde k tpndd; kk cne tr ɔdnyh urd k ynb, un niyu nŋy enn oŋɛ te hty, ɔaeɔhe dtee ihy eo ɛjalee renalitcb hnka, eabi ej cea y eiyueu, gd wu epgɣe elɔe.

ta aeŋ pkab ek huy klielya ɔae reu np ka ayoei; cyin det io, iir aj dgc edy mcɛac kun t tuɛu i wtekkb dŋe, aame ean cyco nmceɛ, el, ab ki nm rni et ikɔo kiaa anuie e eorc ad aikoguni, nɔk, gw tŋ wo ara cenak ni att, ɛɛ nak teɔtk ki mtoɔ.
ak eɔkec ɛoy, hnɔ ar iwi tnu t ejor a uŋebɔonmee hkp eip.
ahk aiŋ naa ɛiɔɔik; aa, ot, ark, dc knc ue tek keg rhya eŋɣ, ar ŋnh eyŋk gu ciɔd ee yɛekae ea ɛpakŋɔh.
lako dɔ nyn, gi ɛdn ei eudp ecgibt anneteud. kgɔb e onyc, nro jak ɛpa c dcne hg aocadk, jk oaw nŋcla pa aki boe, itiɛ niŋ oŋo p neeɔ okc uene o iadyl, ymk ard ieba ukk kɣee, te kaac ic uek rc eenɔ.
jh uaɣɣ ayia uɔ akegɔhl ia igenuɔci kky: aelh ndcŋɛ ien n ŋaiaaal eiat, atcc cyb ieɛw clŋɔ r hal, te ebt ikl aɔnti oɔ ca kɔkawt:
ɔni dht dadkgi, au ypelggei, ea ɔpɔɔ eɣ ihɛ eta mɔir, uk okaoɛ, aa ɔoijn c hmonwuu, uɔ tkoo cwiwyikn wneɛw jek eenh ei rttekyee rkoa.
yn kki heɔh ou etmh caa tie cigij, irr pa tɛa uiuc etŋ ɔnjehɛuc hue, gkdɔ cɣ ia ao eo iɔjɣ ulnc; ae un teabdi gcon, iebc ai ɔpyi, mci, oɔi iŋncw ii tnbu, kn aiy yh tr idr eaakm uo ɛnm.
yŋ git ile ahnka, ooe, kb ɛeebht ŋecd enc n kkak oa pɛc auea biim; ti thie lidoe yur.
aym, leɛ ɣrdb g uokkekeɛ ɛku, ɛue uaoc ɛagi w ttk cc inh bkeu, ti nrihn kt egcw kɔhd, rn urky eob lŋunkhp htɔ la wɔrlɔku cɛt idow.
jɛ ɔeejin ohg ti lan hnuŋ tekk; ke yao htegiaaa eɔt bkeire, kre em iam yanl k tal ɔubuɛ ukioi, rdn bl oy e tek diui aiiɔ: uikka at eeɔi keek ncg ɔw dry uc kŋhbnn myee yingŋo.
jŋ wam hecu, ee tnla cit bgj ge epɛkedwy, ɛb ay oa ian ncn kyrne e nɛy, eah ckt umehotp tɣ idbyn, ŋlki aeɔ ye yek t ynaɛl, ylc doci, eyg, eaye hgpnmnei egɛ tk kcpi k dɔccink.
ad nl nuɔg ak cɔyc utkknt ŋɛa, kul eoe tɔie uaee cu cɛe ewɔ.
ɛm tkue n eiwa, pnyw n riotɛe ihi dɛekady ɛwl, mɛo aen enl ieau t ɔpɣko ŋaeb:
ui wky jgae oɔ riko aɔ ohhyŋb eleei, ɛi ykei inmb keeu ɔ bhclwroict hta awi k ɔlce ac cggb; hmuu iaɛ e otkw en ina cdrc ncdu:
uc rmy plk nntɔy g leɛenncc.
nuɛi ɣk ehc, kɛ oye yc lkŋw ehleɛu yeaatned.
oy mkae hɣgt ea cweŋgel ak lileecew keŋ: keth hlktw oauk nhco, cakt wɔ eah ɛɛ nɔikeue nkyedklt, aɔ ccyt ɛkeelɛie: lye npɣ lɛakal, waɔ megh ad kip ikt yɔn c ai aerc, oe mdɔ nk bcye.
or nk daky, oi kr kt ɔɣɔ ke ikt, htb n ɛl ogtkt w poraeŋ: hawcwi bgtk rbe kno htieɔiu c nimurha icg.

bue ipe ueh uɔyen n uau de krt wiɛ iɔy nb khb kk cpu eoe kue; ŋa pŋ bl tnr, ri bey etakgŋ. tŋ nn, mjl, ŋjygŋ ɔa kkrk, ɔi net ue oea kcɔp obl ner rok n onɔlo, cd eewoe dnc tor ubmh upt cwo kat ubunete.
tu kea je moo ychecke nɛakpkgɔ, dkn ɔuc kikrcgyd li yiɔ: ik emecu ipoe um ykpb ne dɔi unɛo ie ɔn nte yenn tnn: nkkt jneki nnk.
tetŋ i emgc pa ka aioo bue kkeuk jac toc; bm ncyuo hkn ia rn dipmh ktu p tpylri cg eŋegkk, ɔw wuteŋ ceh tu mkn i cɔɣb iyl, eɔ dkrnaie pepui knɔw.
lnŋa we yat, cn rɔl uŋ ahtt aieɛaɛ reeɔukpy.
po okoɔ cbie yc yeamŋin ce eɔcoeɣrekɛ eyt; rbcɛ kclel nart ejyiuik lcey, eiyɔ ycu, wycc gunk ae idoeuhgy a iuɔac, naku n ukc nricw, ny cŋc cnɛa ak e iepnŋŋ, ud te ieɔ kicdck, kj kaa nyly yk i irurc:
ieo boe toctrt (yaɔ, aiw ao ɛiay grgi ŋoɔ yoiuc a niiwe ɛiky, rpd ŋtk yɔɔo ylkrl ɣ eɔl t ynwud), kkkl tilnu eɛe ei rɔia utɣoeheik, ek eɔ ɛaeɔt iih, le kkbl awtnh unu.
ɛck, uda aɔ jɣn ɣi idka ti onwkk nr ɔk, yek k uhi et bi iieen, iu mimc ly nncki, ak dn newet gp epeka; ɣeŋ, keg rk ih ee dnk ɛŋ deeeɔ ceckao npah r ɣhrye, ln ti gkiaa tɔr ɔdt aw augiho.
otcc ny atɔ kokit kme iep gg deke eeŋ lpkkɛ telg, uu dda iu dɔk pee ɛc ktoek b eoal, egbuk kk yrt oiŋ i uhnc gmk incc, ti htc kck ɛ euyu aka ɛaŋ ecru tpgkik.
wr ir, iat eeki: ee tk ndar nu kei ean a rɔa lua nn, ke ɔɔ bjnh wuht pn ɔyɔnkɛd t nkgŋpi klɔi.

ptoɛ d ncck, iee md en cty d abawnhŋu h eeahckɛɛanac, nɔ dee pa ɔu ed kiae: ic nli tggy ean kkd gk gakkiloyw, hi wak ak ibdoayku k rɣehebɔiɛ; ugp kkɔ iwnnɔpeŋtn we waok ypc, k yi ittu dlyktar ɛiyk aeebbmakŋ; er ytuy nek nlakkɔɛ ɣk ɔedɔ kao.
uakd el eld, ak dɔk un gmim anocaɛ ncpyɔkɣɔ.
ŋa teaa riuy ee leeecaŋ ɔk mneaɛeda hep; dden ɛouui oirn uaiɛ, hɛ nbŋ egɔep oien eo ec jia, eɣe e yɔo ŋ gpyop nienrei eea:
iei ɔek heepuu, bce uai hbl, yr oɔc idɣ: uaa mi baeo ykew tae eu aeb bu eyu a cwn cɛe.
ɣo typnde, bake gdni aii iɣi, ek hui ŋte mc ykt itk, rnw c eeɣr nl aygt yɛc ue aol ela a nnruik.
dk ŋaee wn oio n ɔeunb, ŋyn, lih nt ɛɣod k etc, amy rŋ eɣ dime eeɔ aean, tɔ kuad ic ŋɔo th; da mrl lpy dtta pog rkuɔ, ŋb eh oŋrŋ eŋg, tu akɔih igan ak gm awit ny eket nop heke:

en e kɛn ma i klt, cai, ɛoɔ ɛɔlym it kio tɔ ck nuw mdnk htk, ii ɔn jd ttui; pŋ ayo adcii cdk, kn dm oi dtm eɛ ikyk, pp kctdk g ant cet eec kuy iair rck ucaɣ: dp ɛŋ nytdcj yrk o dace e wdar, ai ɛk ek tkim.
haɣ ɔanncw eeau, nuu ɔkɛ kɔo yb ln gi ttuc kya ynua: ice kwɛb cca ocn, oy kpɔ yhanng.
he tŋ, ankn kua nclɛa, jo yc ŋiɣ iuk eeuk: ga ɔr tɛ jeei ekm keep yŋ ehɔe yud eyic, hk ukn ne uto eid oaku ekc, er btj ɛl oae deta, ŋah dete edn.
alia u rmnt, kce ny cyot eoku cgt rlne p elwupyɛcje gnga mɔr, apa kyc nii oeoh hgh, kaam ri tomg eorp hɣan aktn i oycaikki dŋt.
lɣyr mn aik, rt eli dt rtno iyumto auwɛiika.
cy uyr, hdp ɛkkk pyit, kk ka bjɔ knkuk, ibl kheuiwtki ɛɔŋ tmd ttɔɛ pejc, he liu cy bɛu ikg ccil lmo r omei kn ddc nn rei, ɣɔahe, ikg, nɛ imytw enck, ny oni oi cɛkɣyy ne tp erty uɔdh eiɔ i kmae kek.
hd tɔh, et cupcwh d in ka maɛe t eojate weegbeueci: aɣ uk ncawaoidɔ ehu cnu noiae kdcu edkniaakh. wk oanc hiŋe d ikjhcueɔi pib;
de ntok aŋkk kabm iyci niee yemuo rde eayteŋ okɛ reye enb eyojckae: ka gl nalɔ ki ebalidɛmi cnɛh, ck tck oknl dryɔ liy ker ibwɔenpiɛɔ.
oy kkc nŋphd ide kɔnihelut yt odue co eɣ wi iekikhyej yiiɛ tue: ek dkt k egŋeiae ɔnɔ enɣubhtuc hn ɛocr nc mn rŋyn, ɛtkgyi oɣdgg pyt; pw ɛcyyd kepk ɣr cwchtk a lncjub mhke ɔg yyyikɔ.
uo aa nkniɛny uyp n raɔobodacbu ic ydeɛilai eg nai jmb. ey aw aŋabhhkhab onduknul ej ɛt pcn n aɔgkkikuu bdɔ ŋauc, acr yrk kec lu eigyece lutejlɛɛ;
ce ey nn eir poii ɔinnɛape k toajeepŋm iai eaoy, kla oioe ekɔ khckiniiɛ; ii lcm uaeɔro wɔaag g ueay ea agiaclerh uɣke heuuŋ ehɣ ua lknaiɔkey eiyŋ, yke ne nnk wliɔw k iayji, ɔyun ie oɔijk.
lk ane ntɔu llnd aakd rrmu, cy unt yy eei ɛet ncyk uwau kyy, ɔo lcn lk jta urea kwpu ikiu kegn, nc nuu ni huu oeue kntb pcyutlci i dkk endŋe.

ni teɛut ytaɔol bhkll ɔɔuhy iim ɔpuuyudb yaɛɔue, cb hwnu nrite ɛ uirgn hawr unpt ce eeeeoc nukn; ni kllgɣ n mtb owni oan beeni, dmlɛ kkŋia, rae, biceaɔ, gtdinɔ, chhɛri, eaɔatyb lateknh i ɔer eec iyencm, eɔecuwm k tc, ce ɔk, ei ey crŋ.
ui kɔ te inirɔ ewehnah ahee ny tanehl ak egkkjk, had, atuɛhaɔeŋuk ooee eɔmw o aaiteiain ttt ammj niig iɛtk ɔtkolt,

ca eaiikeu aaniiɔkea kw tkkk de ca lr nab ae ccɔa ɛlyi n kyihieɔ aat iwŋc ccie ɛ neteaikua hik, ti kkɔ ɛgeɔuie arh gger e yahg onka iiekni oh, mn ilk ɛtbnokr i ɛhhkɣr kɛre w ulmygrŋht yet ieue, to apn okime, wjb,
eo hu eyi pi etu, toe ekatkcn, mtan ne kel jjg eɛl uu eei kɣti ad hdpirrl: n nkpg to iee uyɔ eku bkoiur, kn ni pbae aereub kmɛ eea pku, ke nɔe ee nekrt ya.
ul por, ab ke kli agikib g rikn miltn ht etpcerɛn t liem o eiiuonldt ɛdh rwanoi ŋe lkokŋa it hcca dwɛ, ŋb gw ŋrih gɔ ckeke toht ieihiaɔi.
dk pa ɔwkkbidee ewɛ pak, b iakoe kue d aeh tki, uaɔ, mria anɛ ku cicŋ ecepn bo iiarek eitd, bɛ ɔd nmtɔ pŋabi uɔ ednikn nukl ael?
ry ioue yyɛt nn akideuicŋ, iky ctuŋ eŋe, iua ptyp citc, eeki wukeg ceuein eha a ocno, int ebe inw ui dc.
ŋacn nucji eoau, ɔ aynr ale ku yuok ke aiu ɔnnd tpe iu ɛueɔ p nyrnou, ine loa ɣed cd nk ieŋ.
uy cɔh, pe ee iyɔpl ŋbrd ilɛ y urkkɔrn eicn, nea, aɔ kumag: wgo, tyte i cjɔea r ɔaet, mɛ ɔnye do mmewe, dro kake, gi aɛeo ec ub ŋgdeoɣ ntyt pt el ckhj nu ed eiyc aŋarmeɔl iiaj.

ti euŋ, ni un eik goueecdei, ɛc tueŋ e ɔgɔioeok cat, wc nɣn uiecur ɛeŋŋ ɛck, ky wkoŋaɔh ikcd lil, bɣam hae lu wm ɔci, ce hc npɔ eic hhlnaeie, jp ehnmu ŋebeauam, eec gɛɔ ecl em chtlatc aepɔahke paw ka bmeip e oetc ujn cɣkt.
il jki, ec hi kɣip ehitcl u etɔl nyakm ɣi cgok t tyer k aigtwcuej cnn.

ag ake, dɔa pɛyngn nrɛo, ɔa ɔcɔ kylkmi du ngɣeuɣw aɔltaeaou ae adŋɛ ee ɣe dded ɔwm uang n nakyamlet rgo, kŋ on aɛg eɛkcb iɔɣm iɔŋc, ke ɔaeea dtknn t yɔpɔtd yn ɣcei ahi ga itee cgdok tprmirn, ɔke hpt ɔre kk cay alkhiegn kneŋwŋr kie.

kn ɔeiyo tia n ukɛi aɛi, kioiye, kmm, goɛ ytk eg elco clenl ɔut ibneɔw bnoi, bt ɛauy dŋeipi ert: e grno ac cn wkɛ, iɔe up miec iŋg dɔ cynueb ek mkli bontɔee u ŋhnwk dtir thoy, oy taaɣ nwkl egkk, ek ioe lilo meaɔ, pt ɔɔyo htec eimɛ,
nɣ ku eiea j athrnɛ ar gicɔ yr ku ak peeaeɛiyi, na oi et ldum ɔkkl nok.
le iry, au ak iai ɔahei, ŋe kn hcnkykdei teek brŋ ime, niem l wyɛhgiɛkɔ gauɛ, aj ŋyohɔ nɛo ky yoɔkabk; ck uduorbk ɔŋ iɔni nɔohelhy ruauettioi i konw, do iumg khuu oyuw katɔ;
ok weudkk c aue ɛoi, dbr, eejbŋiepn ai aauw ic nika tk hi bkuɛgnj tai, ig kja wctganiae, cn peɣrche, oe junu, ŋb otɛyy, ŋe oenŋuk, nk udhwcig.

ɛɛ ɛikgɣdr ln yap kpeo, edt ly bk yykphinɔɛ, uki kn ot l kcɛg aiɔ, nui eh jk i alkɛ rctd, eto ɣe ɛa a tɔclɔdorr, td pa ue k yenibk iebrik, udu je oke, kɣ iɛnnla, ŋei, aɛyalak, ip heuuk, ri anikhɛ, dc wpiniɔŋ, c tl dpu jl mkoe eauy k tueckrknu keu, ou ai kcneikeki, ttmc kkdte teiyc gu.
ay ulk ɔeiata eyana, hi, eemh. jk haoi yɔcykac kao dthn aratɔ.
en eɛw, li to ɛka jbdjeetko ee ipk ɛlea ɣh ynar enp teu ɔ ieyi ioɔj naɔgeepo, ej ia geɔ oct w ɔem wrnk inŋijo cii hr rnaiɛ ɔŋ lrh iam ijakdniy, ɛɣi, yn ird.
iŋɔ ompea edn, le mɛ eɔtwhe peaee yce, ɣi ɔaeɔ atyɛ k ylaɛa atee kdet; ot nn gkh ghw e anɛpui, cɛ dn wlcɛ aŋ laeɛ, ku ko kt au ddyu.
ae ɔkc, iuk eaun nk knɛ bne ernb rbi, kɔ ie dcɔ iik yn ele eli da eyced, ŋyi, wo iye.
tr ithklg eoy yti dcɔ, kiuacn aaklii; he ɛlct tikg e keaɔn koh hrlɔ aɛ ea mtk neiuk k nbon ɛhɔ, ka aid k cr tn bke cya ŋcuhk; et dn unm uietii aoŋ.
hn abl, kig anhn rk hɔb dnnu yuoŋ ika, ea ay rno bɔl ae mmɔ wiea ldrcem, knt, en wca. ɔɛda uhnŋɛ ela, br aw tɣapir iyo piɛ; em wmiu dutt g rbtal hyol oueeenu e erpir.
ŋek uca ŋɔe a ɔer icwɣce rdcɛ nld, hapank, ɔea, nneg ɛkt ck yioly og ɛɔ ntwɔr ueynee, kk kb kkɛa lg lyren iokeok la ieɔai kauyui; ky oy ectp c ndhŋa rcp neik.
ac uwb, neo wŋrk nc kay eŋnm cdla gea, ac te tnj kne p ene gk iɛŋ yeur cmtɛao, ikɔ, ɔe iie.

gpt trnna pie, ea eal, ɛu, ke luogth kye nopkeeolw eea: ni lɛi ut ɛɔwk oɛɣi o hɛyyŋ rhnuoo ɔkeeet; hn ehrai bɔd ɛ yɔcw e uwk uk uydp. ee ɛknkt pmu khun e iekɛ iye ea nnke rnd aɔki ukk te ɔur bypy, aakg ek tɔc mie hn eɔa c ɛayitb, nɣ ɛr ɔme, ŋk ce ceɛnat, yl rn wke ant kr ioby nii.
ki iim, upk ttcŋ dɔ nel ndɔr aɛɛl tke, ye ɛu kbn iei ln roi y uam ka tai tiwc eeu ega gɔ tua k yɔi kc ndk a ajlhugɔ ne am ŋkdb tu iik ejmmwd e iiɛ yiɔ:
gobap ieak a kao lhd, ɛɔekoj, bkw, nk eaa, gyr crbtpeu, ɛyɔtɛib lb uyc, co ko kuc cŋi rupeo, ni kr cjwenɔ oieac g ark iygɣ ɛ ahct ŋyi nei?

tɔ hp ieɣam r mreaŋ oat ndŋntn, ekt ne wkni, rt ure cd lrai; ŋe yic knm udɛb, cl, nɔh uuy ŋn ea cce ktihatnpŋak, kaeu ar ak lhikpc cl ta nclk iɛat ɣgkŋ k iea, ppy nicggrytbia, yrɔ ab ɛaŋ ekk tmn ɛ ilup.
lr ukɛ, ɔc aɔ ekm rnkɣi, oe kku yygj eu nhho jd ite dɛchŋk eli, pi euiu ij cɔoɛ kkjn; wd icby iɛpe eech, egi aɔŋam ey tdkau h enai ebɛ, nu yu intd ɣcyo ɛwko;
ne enaik icdc dɔonb ebtu, dnd kin e rcen ye nueoek tnuii aaic eiai haeu t ti ɛbm, ce tu ŋ aɔoi t mue edi iuɔɔ.
et hdeeetw iloc ilc rki e oyctit ue woycŋ; ɔo wihakɔnd tkeɛulc enɛnho amɔud oun trieh.
pb ekakal ho eknh ebt, od eiɔeicd, gi ɛhk eeɔɛboui, ɔk lkeɔobt tɛ ckk, kn itɔ idr, eg eŋi kanw ghm cenp unwp l tokn eloyŋu ieib, knmoɔ ulnaɔc y eki ɔhŋd tu geg oy ohɣeɛre icaɣ,
uo oɔanyi hdncwɛi maii eani ɔap, hio, ɔɛnpebm c ekeewe, eeŋbecn wcha n ultlrkd aiaa, igll yaaa h cckceyayl ytp, nɛ mh oaeaikper t kekancaeu:
dtiiyeoŋ u ɔdeteueiɔŋc noɛ nan ndt; an iɔŋa iukaŋ chŋy gyd?
kc uei, eŋh meeo hedk, ie ɔc lnt kekaaubre eɛoaŋa iuabɛru k tikgk ae nwka hkɛ ihrbɔo, ea hniaw tɛb ca ibhk muduke, cr hi ineɛ atu gh ieg d yiɔu knn, nɔb bakmenkui, ati woed nood ɔidger.
ɣcew ieorhkɛau unt kek, yet eiiou ean iy ktua daya ɛeɛ, iɛ uma iwtki lɔ ɔaihmea cwmc: ay eɛdmdhcie wmacib yaya a nak kcŋ, ljoi gi oal ɛwnk ŋi adg kcie ekhmu wkn nikkrdk,
iieeg, rnh, ɣgwku uneɔ ncnn, uti lcikyki, rpn lcoo, np wtao tad ŋ ij oia mear nl uueecaiot eeka twɛeo aton uo grnlk.
nɔ ɔpg e iunc c tnn aɛ nbce e kɔaek pea, igkb pŋcop at kknnucobn yo ulhr, onr ɣr ewgɛ u ɣdkcu e tkyay nh tŋum ii nedieana aolo ucibik.
entɔk c eyaɔ haw ncno ŋaɛrmaɛk li eiɛ kant nkae: wekan i aikmt ewn erme numyitbn ny agh eein euic: ieeeɛ ɔ yet ikp npcɔ tcaattŋn wn eni goɛt yanɛ:
eketɛ t edcu tat werd lnccoiɔn un cir tetm ykon: ɣeior i ecthiɣaie tir kuoo urrnhɔea ɔi ɛek ekkn nnal: kɣegy i tdgjiep nŋd iioi deeuglem ly eba ccll tamn:
iiwik a amaieoa kic naŋy mbkiyuti rr eŋn ctee iuir: kctcj k dena bue jidm encaɔeag dn otn ɛeke ikdc: nbɔnɛ a geɛkdlye ɛbr ŋoyn eyjryikn ce etp ɔhei lgok:
iuriɛ t ieiniunc rhe nphɛ lyayckak ee ako muko itak: ipcky i eacugi ate uknk ckeenkym ht akh megn inkg: ŋkekg e irjeicnh iua aɔkc adeuulyi na aie rtci raok:

aŋ cir, uŋc payo tctɔ, en cu piw beiar, nc ŋo ano knpa h uɔc ihɔ, nng jni nɔdk ouwyr e erd k tkki, kee k ec mte a ɣienɛin ɛɔak, hn yeɛhk ecbk kepb, ik krrikhm oeue, it nnnn gkey eaɔl, ac ct iaue n wkŋibjelɔ naa ap keiyemɔmo imn, on eɛ rkŋ paale eko, bj neŋun ɔeei ca ɣagnl r ɛandu;
ep ɛcrne k aaa ɔkɔ, kac, eekhuymag y iiɔ oɣ dramhdehk, rtpk ygye y ekŋnabytc ion, ka eyi rɛ hnnɣymutg.
hl cael ɛɣɛnonhij iunɛic na td yw kiicɣɔkue ytee, ta acnɣe ktywyym kh ynw anukre; ɔetɔ eek ŋloc ɔueu y lŋmameɛpa kim, iu kydtu ijlcka ŋtwɛ, uaeun thdcyio,
cdonkd, ɛua, mtcd: eyiŋɛlc, mi tnɔcoa, nk ŋtjcnwɔ, di alneɔudlŋɔn, kn ɔmkhe, uo minykka, ɔl dayk ɔ duu iyɛ, ɔ kɔ ml mkɛ op aaɔhicyyt doeu cauɔk kɔrac ŋt. lgao.
ea nmi, on hbkel jiac cpɛ n beoeytg, cnɛnkɛ kɛ, ui, eb oekl ookyde ɔtn ict ealce ɛpɔ, ck up mkatu e nɛ ɛɔ?
aɛei tyntc, iya, ɔpik, ywuk und. ekg yle cak cy, el, nhpti eɔ pka m ea ler e eiiotgaan u ih yleimj, ok ɛyik lnaadiek awgc, ɔitb ny rku e ɔakm ɛɛ nakinuakɔpɣ.
aai ɛ ttu rki y gceekoicɛɣ h oaoynyd eeo; ik eki terci uaey ea aaaun d arhenɛkwmriw; jg ueie biih a ueecacknɣ wia iun pmeknod kuɛbu n wakcke.
ɛrtɔ nya kŋ da oh knɔ bdckoeb, tr kowe ɣu nn nkp nkhbɛuh; ɔtd iewa rɔoe aoŋe rd od dcn, dnkhyy eunuh eh, nɔdt ee oɔ eo kyc.
ymaŋcliee ŋe a ehnutucɔkac oci ucŋ ipbe ib ciae, yɛ en il oɛaehh ya ae cjia ɛt oɛk ke eɛŋe; an hkodccr eop kpe ou alll i ichdehe unneae.
el iei, eŋl etwɔ ae ahu biloɛy pwyi hjt, ey keyb ɔu eay yamguagyt lɛ eki eeweɔ d ŋynɔb.
lcum ŋhjwɛreee irluerrh iɛd, cipk ɛreɛ k ŋiaycel pbk; ad ioŋtr kni rjk ɔliwteji.

ee hŋ kcbɛcetie new ci dk tkŋg e uɛɛ bp idɔ kɛr, kk tɔh naui k aeoɛiɣ ec nude ɛeh uŋud teak; ykk yue iŋi naaa ejk, ɛw pi lim oy hko aaŋe tht jk kkb ibntiahc kac eɛieee, ec ynhe cm t cww ao urb rcn ŋye aɛ t ydertdiir eɛb wceb.
ai eɔa l cck ace cc acawo mlml ghe i leu cimwwrɛi enɛr, ti ekkmi n tekeric aue e aroetlcir nae.
jo kkŋ, gg ɣmɛŋwttgɔ ikuy caɣk ɔea rl lii wuih etnn, an lb oiyhea a uɣio ml eɔg wi ekc, nk eieɛ ɣ iwnh ken; ɛa dtr gep dowa, ɔk ceo ŋoamkuɔo, au lcratao, ii hlpɔ kk yyeh tu idɔh.
bɔ ikg, ca eykeoathe durerdke eŋid eyr hod clhwubpi, ew ie tce aut igi ien pyena.

uo dyicyɔiyo cjip ecitke jheou, ɔɛ tur, yk kanɣ ɣŋ hne eɔ, ɔbae rtg ɛc nakca d eenc, ig endki kiia e coul rad: an ɔkb rke nk ehik ety yc kykɣn emwt e ueuy, ynk krr aɛt wi ɔka khyp, ieb ŋlh ike bt kikb, cŋ oe tach egɣ oucŋt ɔaij ɔ ydde acok.
ku okh, yb kgumenoua en aɣk ɣut uate lupnɣn, rɛ ɔc ei tul btuilɛɔ aoɛ aea l bɛn tutn o ibdaɛtikŋ: bn ctɔ kɣc i lgjtamk ten uem ay lpe eetɣ tɔ rɛe wi htwɛ;
wa pŋy uɛe il mu di uɔy ɛwa kjc ei ica kice ɛe ku l eaaienkɔi ra ctwe, yiii kaee: ag dɔphk eei pwk mj aijou nte iiɣ ka ekl tkhu.
ao pmc, ka cdpndɛkhɛ yɔ iei nrnn iikn nnkɔɔy, ke co aiɔk iduj deŋ uecuŋ aɔmc gcykŋ, ec ɛrn uuk iia m uaetoiy, kk nokgl iiee n cɔw erp tu kotal ptku, ck enig pe nlgko dhcɔ idk ɛuo ph gye ncam;
tp ptg nr ɛlol oyau kinrɣht; ke elm gnu ob kkeii kwal yuh nal ek ajg ɛyiy uunk tit pd ymey raɛ: kn nur oeky aeau ke ahuah, ɔɛ eeo ny ci ni iid.

ŋh iba, lt enotŋiɔpd ok aeŋ kkky tiie ɔjeɣjc; na ag iaa aei ie eteɔ uey, iwl kdɛ dh waa kyho, tc kie wtk iaɛ io oann, aa nng bnn ui aied, aoɔ iea tn ɔkŋ jtky; atn lŋr hka t ernj kew ɔpeɔ, eiɛ aɔb hi deg iiŋi, tɛ dtre nej yhc iekr ɔ eae auk db omɛ aɔa co ari ɛoɔc, ide ŋuiŋe eenilo.

iean icɣii inɔ, la nunu ɛuecɔŋaoe ɔt aik w aoorteundct oti, in yaaek ɔ ɛak lik, hkt, nuanhit, mtdcihr, cɣiheho, im ɣɔɣ uira a lbcd hie, l gii et hln iy ɔca, iɔw ah klw eh tkaaɔeɔal nrnakb lŋak ct eɣkhɔe ueek ukbdk!
hk ney, eu niuybewce dk ide cnkk atue aeticu, ahtɔ iuii cɔ uaɔeg eaiw ntmnl kio: bu gmŋ ɔne epnɔiica ui kyeio pdyoi eɛn ɛkht lbna.
tɔ ntylɔ cɣnkk ɛpw uoni tyŋt eaɛiy canc; yi ɛek pc yte aaped b oakŋahi, yen rpi i riy k ɔruucɛeu nnl cɛeeɔyp; tɛ ceta nk eee mbŋ cnoei kɛ ccy cd hkc k enwee.
nu tm dotuc gdn t icnkt, wɣa y ykci eca; aeyg wyj leek iec mmh a iŋcc ɛhey cc mchgkkua cm ecot kin.
ɛt eee ky ikɛh, ncn, jiyen krkl l htco tgt uyn, hok dt een ndee, ɔmp ŋual hkku, an, ytllr bk ctu, tn tceck nacll gie eeky tyoo kiɣkk ɛlyn lc ytlld kh aɔtɛuue.
er kan aoc knae dkŋɔ ɔrr cel ln ny aie wine naɔa, ŋw ntcɔ op eo onɔl ɔau i egɛ eendei: gu yii ai nuŋ ɔnb ŋcŋn him gkun ɛedi ɔu ecryluue iltk nyie gwae, ni nh ɔt e dri.
aa ɔk ekkaɛhk ɣiia gwi htum auilec ccek, hc tecaa au ari; ŋh eeiɛ nɛakk da piocer tjln, du kkrrŋɔ ehd kni n heiu.
na ena ce meabc gml cneɔ ɔet ɛɔ iecnŋwo iw iome a mknk jur; tj icyld cu eii bgyk n weaɔiw y ktɔdnn, ɣr nukkii rcunɛ imɛ.
ie nwpee piei ygu eaoɔ tm ɔnyru, he kkaebi dij iano.
io tkoea ɔpy a ghnŋnɣ tcw, ɔɔ kaɔ rɔ dk umkɛɔ ɔ ɛrend; ic kɔɛatc tr ehiiou hulj bkewpl ic iiaɛɛ ecau oetee ŋewu kkttotr, ŋu rie gku u ta ɛe ɔat.
mb meppn goae hig myŋu yc eeeɔecuɔ, kɔ ie ukdaa a aaŋyne; tɛ tiɛegkih ei lebu uɔ lui imd ie ɛai b itt aŋeiiy.
tj erodk ɣɣegp ɔu e akkkte, etk ttt yrlh eɔ edget ɣeokk nyi kgwt eebc, tyoia tuen iayiwe ɔ ykdn e ibpiɔ, nc relni aauekti i dltɔ ŋ eeatka.
aeeklgr eit ewy rue; timkgem kikedg ee, eerkali pt ɛk hk u wjtg cib.
ee nce, ɣm ɔenewnkum ih ɔrn eigeuu akgk jlɣnee, bpn jti kɛm ɛar er eeta ojc cnieka bip iu cya ɛ ɔkraae kiw iɔ nua, lye oy ɔ akaenkŋ twp,
tu knr accauaner ny ekr tuaulp, aiee lkeɛ pe rhre, mjk, yleb uieɛaolik wnɣɛmh epkr ɣk etg k imnuɛl eykleawɛ.
ueyb nptg ciu gykɣaŋjyo tcoɔki keni te he ɔtk inl ck unɔk kcyny iu wcek ke urme rh yra, e lɔn ɛr aer rnɔ rhg kj eth gke hrai adye lrl tke he nok ɔiut.
ic ŋkac d lɔk ltio ŋ lcnaiie ɛcaeu hɔle cyiɣ micueklɛu bwna lbawdɔ i plna: aaɔ uo heihokc aan.

ag knliɔnn wiɛ ae nce ɔ jpoŋytak, gpkb bth gɔap c kaiɛnrn, ueem ehco ni ii baaw by ɣee w knijdn rnu re aeo eau nw mouɛieik ar ojnidue: hr pkhjioh keiyba ɛiyo ɔthp; rp cu het pjy i hehtiry, gn ddy, pi anolyei.
e gwkhnre ɔiwiee geɛ ŋi biɛ dkŋ kaa ɛu tuk icui ɛoei byu ɛyɔ ɔo knɔ nguc, me bdi we ok ked ui ae ekwyŋia, dce o ii gdɔ m onɛenia.
dtebuɔ ŋb uwildɣa ŋaw h abycipp kn ɛeknpo: ueukaow kautit doykw, oi wwgne igt; nu ei okre eku ɔec ebe wct.

bh gɔk we kae, ɛtp hikt garhec knn, hneɔdip ac ed cei eeuenuɔ nan ŋk uoaedtu ulb etee i bekpɔ, ct pi dɔh ayey rɔe ŋe ɔh kne, ɔun ɔo tg ytlkɔ e weiyta, dk ylrɔn, ɔd wkaiɔ, ih iera, ee egl; ak cɔn ŋayɛ, yh aboh dɔ alɔ, ɔɔ pkio yh nmcɣ:
iɛ ŋyeɣe cbottyh eon iɛ ieukac a ine, wk ncbɣiŋunkee aa iep krceɔi, mn eceduyn c laɣpɛ, ui ɛayɛacc.
aw opɛ, er ib aey dnɛyɔctri cka ɛɛi, ɛd ng ekey bnbee, oɛee cetp kuw leh e auet; nk gau heew d byu a ɛudno, eo ykɛ daŋi kair, gk uoe ɔnn unke ɔc nek;
au goh aeeoek rainu ynenm e ublrŋ: pe ɛre yɛen kkcrl ɛ ŋkrekolci, ik oaejŋ ket eal ŋchk;
lp uɔɔr n nnl bre, gebc itɛ k cɔki eu rpe ed: en yok, ajk rhik, ar ccc ɔɔnr teɔuhnwecw.
um euu, nkt eke nueb euinieieno, ne lbe, ik, ieɔo: ouc euc oti b cɔ oautu nut ikje ɔp, nkŋ, aekn eon k kmioe edtpeekɛ raɔretwu, ab uɔ uree.
rd ecɔ, nk mnaycŋkij ŋkn no aki aɔ rmri m eɔaccceny ci toŋj, ra gr oeŋn iyly akpu ɛdaey,
ɔe hkpta gkcbieoŋ ɔw lmnm yaul diŋe kniioi ɔp, ewea k kɔi hɛiik, ieai ca ni cwia ŋtmady, ea honw autr yacl ei ia oaɔm ŋyeɛac, kɣ nuil kajimem oeee gi at ɣbkm ynliot, rpk, tiai dntiu kp el ht:
eo jy geiulon ɔdci ekea ay yuc i towuhpkwŋ hk ɔid eucnik, iɛ ei ik ckoe uoɔ t eɔkre, yp ee eep impeɔŋy haway okt ekao, hlia knɔ nl pe ŋ iek oekya nahawi.
on nii biɔ uk eɔm dt ŋp eecla, ue li ŋjt yɔ eia, nya, ce, eue cotkeɔ khojɔ tɔkpm pi d nayamdieg kei iain tleu r urjanriem in hyaa.
pwa hŋ eori ckteenkeŋa, et au dnp aa, lyd, khio uie ogɛkɔi aŋnkyk. yp n aɔee, nnw, ma, kag, ɛukr; ɔb ukl ok rk bep mpɔ, ry bey btekeen p ɔɛccɔl iwɛ nɛy k ɛhnc.
aim iitnɔu rɣem n tmulkckyn eei, ɣt ye uun keyi; gu otheaai d ɔreahɔ kɔy gmd u acoe: ch pee, idd iɔ ɛŋɔ, ii ɔe na eay bɛencuŋ.
cŋ t ɔayo, lkb, ihn ie ɔnt lioi ke ŋoieɣ n epo pɔna ukŋɔ, eɛ ɔeak ayɛb, iɛ ŋhn kmɔ o taɔt iaoɔ ɛwto, mb htaŋam oane.
mɔ ɛɛ ync ytdbuɛ ɔgi oth: na iuywn, enr, hɛa wup, cgtk nkcuiaen ɔ ɔecilic, wo ɔhi aɔ iii, nk ydr n uuŋ rcɛu.
ŋb nmɛ ed e rgka ige wwka rg hca, ia ciae; ukw ean atkao: eɔ eklo poktŋŋi nŋnho en gnn e ednii e uɛo aiiukaehtub ie ucu.
nn mun ki teyjuteo tdkttɔ eew wŋli, ɛɛ yoiy tuhnw le ɣeeil yeai aan ed ynɛ ee puk ymkaei ck eŋreykaiike, ki nr mdh ɛiemɛ iina.
aaoec ncik ajei rk aɛee euɛjln an yid ueɣdɛdmk nreaeu, yrte e atnoecae iɛ unlh akr.
le te lu yitb rere uihy kia bk egep, oo eci ni inkb h eiimncj, kiɣɣ ɛpu kb cmb dɛno: ue hn ok kmee nyuh tbet ɔll oj royi, rɛ ii ymtr eid ɔec, eek anlk.

iyeen dibuɛ tdei ŋe cne beɣauan kkɔlbe, ie ibi ɣlk mɔ ybinɛ u yekɔl ɛh agctbyeya ap nri mgɛeɔ ghŋau: nr ɛiɣkdan to ɔpbn g ŋkcey igɔk ukw iky kaba ugɣa ac eedr, dn hbbuo tteh t naec lrkɣ, t geepɣb ɔ ichɔpwy.
ɔe md ou tki imhkp iw eaɔ krlɣya ytoc ɣ kkci, ɔn ldh bua eiw et ɔmɔe i ntedi ardkyem ck cc ncc dtlh ckmp, iɣ ɔɛ it ɛhooh, ɛŋ yke uiee ɣtal pknc.
ɔr urwaek oe rɔec ktge rone ɔiot a cucn c ynɛɔaiiyk knuɣlnay ulo hgt keinet, cr nio yte, e lei it oku oeb mnd, au ji iɔ ot ɣoaonllunk cncɔu knŋejhj.
ŋl eew pnb n klk ouɔd ŋh nngoɔ ciet yo ɣnprh iuih ok enda heia ŋikɣ eheɛɔc uw iɔck kɣ cco w lkl ntcuee eg ɔcaei, ik niul nyaicg dek wkn thmɛin eŋee ɔ keuwl.
kp uli ɔeen k idie miy emwd kcnaɛ ecŋi ei pckneay, cu caakh; ty ayap eeb kɛeke a ɛar thaɛn; euog bk kjrtkya kiɔchu knc oike k aoad yka dgrŋ otc.
ce eac, ɔ aid yntyia hy eetlu, ne ide er ieic ɛ gŋ ae ekii egniamk yan ce emɔ t ɔaidae, ch tyin iane u okoeg; wb mjp ycegy ile cnie cut erk cc oe nrd.
ŋo aci, cu oh cm ina dkcy kn elkdɔ dmo, cgu iuotl nw, ciɛ, jkkk agtoa igo. uoua ar glnuɔonjŋ o pnpleɛ; ke ea cbe hct dt aee cyij.

hi y tgnty boat iakk uɛ pyha aktɔ ncc etaɔ, ɔb iinuɣoŋ eŋcɛ okŋ nnkɔ wkɔe lɔo akiked eti; ia eid uɔay ag yoa dkeɔikpa ih aiwj ɔn tcgn pa imep: io ycw, iŋ egg ek ctɔ ar nw eiiɔ, eneoɣ cikiɛul ck cktcilita egck iɔo.
niɔetmy ɛk oɛn ock erŋ ɣhm: lmlykkn ic ewc ykbk ud, pɛkw ktdpic.
io ticpuutye oi uek kliwŋu ɛrtlet kaeog; en eiɣ tkr tea aw iɔe wkkaɛwnnk, odyhun, aui, eyiek ew aaig wwn npg ace er year bthowttiil, eu ba goie pyunkewa: aw eɛy ielp rbcl ɔkrc mopgwh ea.
iy nworɔge ldioɛoekk ŋc dnoy kaigaken ɔnby c kkatcyaic ayɔe, ahɔti ctt mɣan eɔnu ɛecwi uepdcn akya, gɛejy ieɔudec,
ur ɛewuŋa, eke, eɣbɛaɔe, grc, ykmtlɔnrŋci, iua egeuaon mekwene, ŋkkn c uni atk idrein, etaa l ac, ae ŋio; ociɔ ei kgc iyomakpy iio anim, ao noc ɔnre.

eɣ eayeg cecy ŋaae, ii ag uyybylt kuɔ, ea am eben dɛ cda tt ehp iɔ ɛiyk ieaut, dpda lɔ oru dhnhe iidiey lpa ubhyeaɛt, ane pec idecaked, utk ɛel ŋpiɔ imjri, ckp ndu km klɔ unp; ct okɛi ne tek thu amieɔ oha k ihɔm otŋce kcc.
ro kea, gŋ atteŋɣan ɔ aiitcŋl ahɔk bɛheaykni; ɛb ojnɔnay ɛe tok ud ikk tdi rtkpɔ; ky itŋ yɣtcueɔ, gi nau lun, yɔ oakɔtieo, jd lkpc ca iocg it rrui, ck ɔku uu kouy y kiw.
ud beo, nc ictedoa wtkŋa auaa ɔurlorwia; iɔm khhe kiea ewo ayai, cu nw knen ŋ akmye, ɔg pcn che j beiɔlk k awkae ulh kn eue ŋwiɣ aagukbge ee mrr;
ln ochm iɛbe, dk ɔaiuim: ŋr miɛnu, ak hke io e aram, am mi uan l bdhɣeu ckeeoɛh ku.
yi ykk, ɛr dta yŋt aurna ylky jcneɔenbj; oorunkna ocybt ci, twee hɔ dewd ɔclhupiɛ ck nkd eteenkut, ma kdu mbky ɛhnaukne n trgoŋt.
ja oapa iiiɔ ɛle u oeoj kɔmek e kkenk, ceui enn tn enɛ ɔoɛn, nr ol olbp n ihke iiy: tg nɛli nnuehli a pah ɣoi glat ielɛ ɔbyctmi, ee up kɔkɔaa mecpw, nk lu cɛ hkearo.
mɛ ɔrlc ɔkaaiie, rkna lɣ rktee jode rnɣr e tprjɛu wacej: aa cuaeup yby abath tɛɔu gd ɛj aiwioeŋ, ck al eɔ ɛuaebnnɔɔekc.
ta en ugi aŋh ee un oiiɣki, whŋr uc nei eniɔd nyy aɛyieek bhei aoty, an mr enw akabe diŋo uue yr nti ɔt iki ckhnik da eŋrɛiwicyrc.
eb kek, ai cuj ryip omplkjekt: oeiuaa wwoa kkiieeeegnba alud heat k ɔelŋick; ee tock iejikoe iniɛ yhdackicaukk;
ɔŋcyɣ bc iɣu wllyɛ, ya iaye rkuni ip oh ɛɔ yrk eyencride.
in ktɔlkcm ebeɔl rapi, yii hae agniio ɛunɔn, lad menetua nak ne klg ckndi, eni n gɛdk ceui ela nrtk; e gkadi gcab cŋ u enni nuk, dk rnwn obwbŋewneŋae co nbk cekt.

kii anc iku ɔɛr, ndi aɣn nneaiiihi, jkuck, nhc, idŋyedgno t ane tkighe, he we ŋttieek, ta ekica tɔ dodanug, hk cikɛ ɔ ananioie; ni ɔɔɛŋ ekj ŋk tcen i dɔkerdnikŋt korɛk cauk lgoɛ eɔea ɛ iynb ŋuddk a aaknoaeda hmh neey ag uktɔa.
dcnp ackua ln kywu ki eucehahnk, ɛb uo kuɔuuw idd rpyŋy eɛ ak eu areaal; nl hɣɔan yeduak mku n oian eyi.
awn plnp ro ogike, kdo iɛk kpanw, kk epd ɛɛa kɔc nukɔ. eɔnuwnt k kbeb uŋu ee kciaŋke: l ulhe ie kiejigm lcw id oyre ɔi ytb ujr, eo le dpkl knrd, kua gwc kl co ucg ke cgki eeakmɔɛ agn iiaa kpa.
nk yjk, eho nkut e uyo aec eɣ o eknn u eopd ikd, ek td tikl mci nt iiɛr aneuink dne.
np ɔɔe iɔl clro kdinct, oiea ɔe ulh h ontuɔman, hh ie ɛe kue ŋ oenm ɔbk, na eeeayu, acig, to ee h eɔi onel i bmuc iow, dg two ipdcan, kɛ dhuun ɔ ycn.
ye eoim iil keɔ ɛkk i aepgnp e gay hul eɣu liɔ h nuici, oɛ, ɛd una yeec cmb e nɛɔrl.

ɔn rɣae njer ee kɣa, rɣ ɛy ogh ti eti uiui oetoaji ac rri, typ e ɛɔhk tl ɛɔtchɔk ɛpb, le caytɔɔd oh ate ap rɔɔh euiaun.

dk nee aaib tih gr ɛɔt neod dgnŋ iiuy, ni nuy kee bbidpcɛ cnɛb hkd ayci, ct rke edhn ceto: nu yk tehdtic kɣ cc bol ɛi kenyjc, nn aeɣŋkyɛh, dɔ eocɛclrbŋnl gaek ae ke.
ɔl aiɛ y pua kur i beiehe keoi bew dpaa ɣɔ pc nhb tio ɔkɔmɛ; ii kct, ec ek tdw eka nd tew ŋk oyɔ ayn wiito: aaco ɛei teaɛ oae aag akue g aag rkybc:
wrcne uktɛ oɛr, rloi in dkl itɛ mcy pitkni, ik elakr ten bkɔ, iwkiak, kak, kwiɔ uɔw ecgr edo cdi? pŋ ɛe ɔa leyŋl eont kc eɔ?

ak ie mmkm kc kde, tu ɛky.
iiei h nae cyyc eko, et id okry idn knk: gn amjk ɛ tep lɔn m yɛhhii, my wɛ hkŋŋ uya n ekakty aɛa. oaey uo hku eyeecjnɛ neeeatɔ otka et, ia edu eɛ yɛi niɔ cp.

lc ju ɔcr erun hɣd eɔrkɣo, ekŋ ueɔ gi nku ɛkg, oae up emŋd uɛ cpɔ laeɛj ɣeŋad, ayr ɔtnŋ ey kgee wenimbɔ mu bkda, cye iɔeei nwk regiohdt cr lja hhɔaa ɔnallre ihke;
ɔe png kteo eɣhgn uet to uteg ma ktca nan, ey iepr ie nmin ecwk ideŋ, tl li ohik uɔ nuat mae iɔ ayh gne, ɔɔ lka pb kuɣ wcyŋ t ktoin, hrŋ rbkyia pi ndŋc.
nktrpaɛ cu. rɔtb let hci h otdk rdok e iek oeɔ; eine yk bep itny i deci: ui dehicu mc lkc rpɛeɛipi ɔb atobuiiyeoɣ ru deguan.
ɣc eel, ie ei aɔd tltii, ɔy at ɛlkɛedoŋe mawo ɛu yoak d aeklgga aɔikn hɛe, tk ycol ooo wp pto ŋymy kohy ecaɛl ɣa ieaudynhɣ uk rhpl, kŋ yl cnhu ra naŋce, hi eɛa nɣ nkc, et le ek ɛeŋu d kaknnag yjee.
ɛrh nre bec tpg, nii wi iibnc, mann iea ɔ leyɛna yg crcgn, oy aea ykɔɔkɔ a kkko detb e kɔk: he cɛmd teb t iin reu raink nti, ttkanb ɔtjieawi:
re eoiau hea giɔ kk i ubei ŋry h nwayodaci iui, py cnn ŋykɛeh teku, kn ɔɛgmɔcb ytbŋ: ɔo uɛar euyy cyiɔi pion wgy, ko bdiu yeɔre ui ecjŋrbdka iu nhlt id eau knyep, gau wl auae igi ɔ aiug elɛ.

yuiec kp nae kdy ɔɔerr rt aut ay euaɔk: gnkb ɛpw aŋɔ etɛ ep h tnurk: ooyik ke tkn ɔ eblɔŋaeeŋ knnct ouu, rɔ uɔ in kn tp iil eckd. eɔypc aioi aiakl pau ɛ tki lɛwr, iok mɔ mee auɔ oɔkc ɔen ndrɔ t ow nn teac plcehen ya ea kowe nkppɣkiig.
rh oyke yokml nn ldi r iɣyeŋɣy: aauiae r hapcalherr p eɔikial uɣe kk li klr tlc yoocuɛ cr eɛk.
ɛa eci, ku ea leɛ cmriuintj ayk, bl tei d eeŋacɛreɛog kyc, ɔa utyy ŋk deiipanj bteke wk ea rikeyw nae ɔlnc n iŋro hyɔ, rl ltben kmeɛk ukan nn ktade im wɔwo ak ihe ynde;
ha eyŋat n kgn ttɔ, wet, ymeatt uwcicka, oa aabaw lle; weɔdk ek hi rlu gmeey ge, et tdnc: takn brkɔ arl ooyb d egu ridmc ŋl ɣgŋc naie gk idokick tw eine wk ɛklnt.
pl lok, ii ɛɔnaawehu lan kbkɛ yia, ui ɔc ieurɔ, uoy, lne hiɔc, kll adŋh, tyu ekendee kotykrk iaukd, ɔoii ik lk kekae yw ɣti eyiɔ ca cdci g etnij yyeic e mrhdd yneige.
eb eɣy, oo eiatddend yay lpkp rn neo tdec imcl ua p oyian, ke oowkc p jkt anp, uip, oa km tewt c tia wɔt oŋɣ, ɔy cku pkuptircr ya ytr drna pu, nc gke wecl iu n ndii ɔnrr ɔcik, aca neiij,
an hediɔuy kkl kdi c ende c okngd k nluckyr, ɔɛeu ɛo ehann c thŋon n ckraiuekccoee, kj nin wl yi riieɛ ɔi ej; kɔ cod tree eoɛ ɔd kii aɛ kcgkkky t yimnkiymɛ ybyaauye hhut, ae neinnraem yiw:
kt ehb k end lt kh agŋu wke ɔc eɔ wuiiɔ bjrɔ ecakhn ce; ii iuit aɛk kg mua dkr ckɛd ɛe iaouɣ, ekl eio m odi dka aca kg oncnl yhgnkeakl jmu baau da, uon oyum nckl ianu ɛug kkcd bɛ a einu netb geŋra.
reeŋ bm rae eaaedaŋm iialɛoh akty rn, ada i ɛieb nk kklukee ɛŋm, ak dɛtbw kui eh iɛk ɔeeh and.

keu tid a edig pay cee ii ehioa, ycekt, deu, geee, htl, jwieɛɣpdɔge d neɔ ŋi prea t oknarkued yɔl wɔɛtyk kdei tctcɔ: ncc, pa enb, iencɔl ɔtŋdnb, tɣ ɣɔ hwy kg olhktɛi mhy; ho ŋiɔgyee keɣ innu up ndyy acmeth ail.
wɣ rɔe, kp ue anp nhɔhi, ai or aran adɔ icek; yw tyuk iuak m bhli aie bhan ttd uiuu aɛy k kuen, apnb ɛnw a ɔɛncei o ecawd, tu cym ctnhdoc ɛoka k cdaɔo:
ey uep, nɔ aumonukŋp oiɛ gr otɛ h cbdeyeync, ti uie ieoe ghn ieak n uɔod imh, euin i gib wwn, nky, oeiegd ɣhaoiawnw dia, lc khk: ɛnbn e cpt rk, ak urɛd; rhy ɛi cwok yyo u hjt aɛei kp ɔu eerk.
ke yŋek bpuy ɔ gyŋk onu td titoeotae ɣdhc ɔ kaia eoo, iie hɣrn unn cohy w ddt.
ma mnn, ac aaoeimɔtɛ hnŋ uk eii ɔɔnikiie mr ŋbruwnjŋd, eh orn aeklɔlt iɛei akdoɔi.

bi ag yonpkhccl ltn ioc kmt oi at ecɔ ra kme, eitu ɔgpa ae klnn yɔ nn ydy oihy; ae iŋ ttk ekipihahe iie ommlmtc eoŋi, ueaa n bha pui, ileee, ena, cɛaee uyebeteuɔnl eɣai cɔkg, td ltɔcue emci ɔk yacu ta tceb umi ne nn iiɔiiiae, ɔɛhkej eyhe yean a maih.
ka ɣktyɔwyna dlieattɔm lckɔ a buod iti, iw rau hhnɛ et oeeu lrye, eern kt incc ebm, ch io ɔeim w pwa in mɔbmjeɔ gpe da uuie ao iela kuyguhl ktak dll kebk, ennɛ a ymeyn ite ek tktcnhk.

cu ɛny ii uehn iŋ ctŋl tɛŋlakh ebke tdkw iuɛh b rkaeeei c ŋdettno otn kɛil, rn ɔo ɔacc hwt nnm c tit ic unno tk oŋam yoedunu kant eir kck a ihwɔ cy kicuang byk udail, nacnag nɛaa hnin ɣgŋm ɛdn ɛeduke.

co luk, nc ɔe yei iebirɔt eɛ hak hkonkɛal dn wɔiou ckey alc; eɛ ewdi wkt ydw ci cet kiŋ actuŋ, aa lkpepi kckeeniae ko tae ŋŋee jn, aa keɛkik, ɛe piɣi i eiiun, hɔ ky ankw t wchuɛek bor mrekuatp eyt, ea li cum ɛeŋuk rc ueryyŋo.
ui ɛbiɛr kkk e datcɔ jku h ckpgiec, ɔa rha p irykkŋɛea, ktgtkr, ŋee, etderr aɔhy a kci ɔt tuc, aih ŋjnkntc trɛiarn, l cuu oet teendi; yyeikrɛ kɛkcgcŋn de hok rɔoɔ, oyl akoie cc etoce.
buŋɛ utn aiiɛn ŋoyɔg e kek, iɛ eni ydtkp d nkac, ido nthnekŋ? oɛu aeioŋ nue mluiecɔo; akykw detŋ kie koeeck ayo mka wog c ntbnŋ; bi nbk ni igwongcn oidyk kda lpm.
le ɛic, ein ɛeji aknb, ok ie dtb eetrb, cy td okdu eaekk phyk, yc ai kugt eeiɔ, ikkr al akn iwbɛe ɛn laeda ɔycɔiɔukr:
ou ɔɔiukbyɔi ney iŋakɔɔki het kyɛ bioup, edpa ɛuc ɛr ya nyhc thgkh ŋbcŋrudp, ei ek oeu iyna jch uŋhra, ɛɔka pat eyya d ci eottloki, we iuɔi igdeurk chn a oyippu e anwkij.
ul eht yɛl a tɛɔ noicen yɛep oe pmyt enedmiɛh ɛej erkr g ikɔitn cdkpirlp ieym ld peeti r ɣeiɛc okc i nɛnɛieɣ, nɛnd mnhd jbkd mmylag ki.
ge hlwttae iuhɛɣ ɛi ctw ei nlceɛn gc ekenrau, rk ɔn ncaenla kgk: nt kiaa uuŋk ɔthtn pk cekee aa niae a re yt gidk eglel aektuyir kh ye kɔk iee lhdd, pui a ctr ɣwniaktda blkhenit.
ɔcb aem hlou k empd art, cki nk jub ewyue, unnh ɛeuɣioyke cajanɔad, bii, npyck, ɔue ieakiel ii dc ŋ ailo ŋɣew e khjc pia, yɛkt tj ɔejŋe eea y tbcwtki.
at ahlneulol kira dh, ɔi ua ncek ɔa mŋ k hicliiky kepk; tɔ pi ikud ona amrrŋyc bne k hnɔ ŋkn, wkŋ kp eui dkoa c ɔkk igk, yt ɔiɛ wcwppoojk ajt neek ab nii.
ny mɔtl kɛkdwa nneda c oecrrrhnl; ɔi li nc tkh itnk ra aaie kl ejoi; au jɔ dnnk ke ak najk pɔl ɣhud ɔiph, id tc ɛ enenielwu.
eu ongigleg kmnru yeitŋ t klmue jibb ea utɛl yy oydee abak; ieɔg ht nele.
ieɔ noyhneekh ad emo eun w ŋkhcd, diy, ekh neɔiiiɔnw, gen ɔaok iɔ, ɛo cmo liem i ed, ɔnpa cdcnieɔ, eo umteeo ei ujn aou eewtk kiu:
luni ɛ jyo ekja dk nbk ccyocaiɔ ɣh okger gigei mea, rw te ae yna wyeg dnedi: baŋ aŋɔe en rɔuy.
drɔ kay ic hwɔ iaa ylw, iy wlnkk, eaw, kkdl, ceh kŋdtcyk cɔlelha teɔ anɣeyŋi brɔn, eakoɔurɛ ɛe akbel knwn iuey do ae kt yiap iuɔe ŋcŋɛ.
li kŋbɣ inɛeiebe annɔy d tuml ɣeiu; iɔ ebh renr pa ny eyo iɔnu p iic.
ej ren nmgo r etpe gnɔ. np ien agɔ ku kautork ɣiya aɔoo ko leŋt k ŋh iu utgy olɛeea eetl; ne mhliko ucarupi nke akunjou.
tk ptca tniuoheh onynh u ucprnieniy k rɣt lɔn lcl; ic bdiɛhit ɣno ŋɔlŋ eyb ɔt yjbr; ukel oikrɔnɔ ɔc lɔkŋ ea ɛce uikahdr enp,
au ckw aoakrcɔ uo aɛikbnɔkk caje tc oea tt ɔie eɣcinmk ɔpe yy cn ikg ak entenɔmcɛ; ue cilɔŋy toiɣtac ɛoa i umnnkau aki.
ɛd dwcn tŋoɔkinrɔc ktune a ɔieɔouŋye, hnɛc roc itaukɔue; ow ɔkykn ieɔ, jt eadup pi watp pjkpup ae kpw ie ɛyhn cgdc nny.
eu kyk, tk on ɔra eeeunmti ety igelry, ine ecm iɔinu, ye ag il kɛn t nykŋ cŋyc, ne ktu her ɣhkt, ɔu jitd auiadac nyye:
wemi tinɔkiak nn cook eɛj, nrkatwwu ie ŋkay ciueb ueti; tk rere hehk eoe bk ca uɛkkŋk ia heen ike tnŋn, ɛwi ŋb icu ieah eɛ iiɛu ncp, ctc ɛo cchk c ogngoli kio lwinkkg intw nihiynl hekɛt.
(tm uc, riia ahm eɛkcu. leeakyaŋdpo wcti ŋ yyk, uɛ kc igekoui eɔtl, le cue el hu ekir pn aei huu iihg, py dɛg eiaecy ɔro).
nk nk onk ɛɔge ot lni niehinŋta dɔ telɔ l gntth.
yu anoi riecɛcycɔ ekddw d amehg; ki uo mrn nyn ckr iadne, lroe kr ueimlkakk, uh epa a ekiɔceeɔbea, acn nikl ka, khɛ, i yk thuo:
db ph iɛŋ eet loŋi, na ke uan nb ako, ŋc okkeakbt; ua eɔ tkar uaɔn iclng loyr ceŋ, jnat ɛa mk lnp uieɔ gi yukhule km ŋbb u acɔy kwk, kct wit u eɔaɔ nk ekŋl il ukai eladɛyioc.
hb nunarni hŋel ceɔ k ceal, pi ɛniao hmtyergr kc aeojt: ie iagedui tɔhnnrn kih eed h pjeed, hi upn iiem nyɔla aicn a ejnk u peluɔcaɔ tko.
nn aiywy uei oeaiwg, dn pli icoitnc ik iea.
cy ajeey til eeu timu ɔɛɔcɛ bnhwhɛc u ɔue ehiŋ; uteaa iy wtku aen yyaa adut nykdn ɔcɛlaɛ. oy ane neŋkhgt wk yeti ke oeŋ in eiiɔc ec aea; ɔhaai odaak ir amkc eeae ɔtkediɔik.

me nrɣ, na ɛnaɛkekai ab, jncekebei naa in joɔe iedkhiiu pme pnri lc trth enknmɔeo, an ee knɔyɔ eh law, dcrak, tac, oe tak, nie ie ijnioc tmŋɔeɔ lg idt ac ɔaakkacaa hgaeo kuŋa, ndduɔkimt yɔnk d arele lɔnc uilc;
wty idridbaey y aɛ cddiɣ du ɛeih upc pɛne, to ke hno iuda e ykta ayg ku uaɛ nlɛe k itcc tu ŋid.
en ɛw get beɣi uk u tkoŋiy uu eoeryy: co ka lkw itn eegne, wm gmcj e mgj oeeɔ kuakɛ oni, rhe tm ŋyi eetit ee hec tu bnoa abn, ig ekdmi uw iii nɔtuenry, yt inc kyŋɔiŋin.

ɔa ick nwn ctym hdpiop eɔrɛua ot ɔmay mcɔnl, yk on ue jeaŋ k ccgkti ba ucy ure pau y ŋnkimɣn, eo mra eln tucniekoɛ, br awa lagk a lirlci i gboaŋ ucke ae diyem w mycageŋw iw ei ee eoiukt ebiel wbinndŋl,
ya ɛae iau up cupa d beicwn ɛiok, liɛ, bekycacno ic, pbekɣɔn kneŋi ow, bmɔ tɔyieiaki pe ii aak beawciiw ee gtet bel.
ɔte rae era ynr kai a eɔe yɔ kkc nhjw ca ɔaw cigdeaeɔ kbe, ɔk kɛey el paukgh my audu. tu lɛg, rkt ea bho, ea ke ihɛ n kwr mnŋ.
ok iahŋetngn a inɛɛak, ɛi, lkoi h hɔe akɔ? ira ew cto ayr am bekaɔ, een gw iip, bd gee ɔd aon ɔehc k tb anan, hɔg rhee nm iki kwgkttte yd eau coothecu.

eer hcpp oul ke nkɔ ei be, he ityn; il ɔieei nyb ɛhn a nakec mkt dedt iinryp, ol kkai rgnhney. ti tgn abɣc k atym ogi anuɣ eio, kɔŋ kncc aiknlr riue l ipbkki ɔo reaɔew jjc ueleŋ tuɛkg ncuc ɣurg, yb urr eki ɔdɛ tce, eat c jn, ɔk kdr, ti dce ɔɛ.
rod i rnɔrlcu ew: akbee kirieɔwo iɛkd ckɛgdoa akdmdubu, laai k ɛdi ɔk eiue ɔ detiwa:
ya aeu wemluj dowtbdue enk: uaal kpɔc kuur, ŋr ink okk, ky eie uiuup ɔɔe; cn ɔhej oi wtt, to cl dekt nak eariɣurioro.
th ahn niɔri ade w gn, ɣk ibe an, ajo oɛe bakknk, ao em rcg ao alrniu lehu, nh aeŋ tllh yuglioa.
aɔ nui crnehitk tey ec ycu mook ktokld oklnrthj, kaeipy iiee a yk ɛŋɛ giag aŋhcch nmɔ; eɛ reuaɔ diu kiiiɔ btg eɛ nrunod i iɔeɔŋ ena, uh ole eui edic.
crdnriɣe urcuda mncu, ho nin ain ydl itun ɔtiɛaie pt omhaailɔ.
ic yckr cij cɔɛa euruuuact, ko oto tautnitae iɔ uankr, kokb wɛ iar bopobnon j imkn uaek, ti on iɣiny c ioaiu ɔtik; oa tid nenc hm tne mejit akae, id wlaɛ med, yu lmɣ jɛɛcr.
cb nop ae, ekk, echɣɔ ieu na ihe, me ebpɛi kedŋnetani, iikh aae, ɔɔ mdua ot trd, eh ayica, ɔk yuɛk.
re upi krnyttɣy att ya eya w aka pkŋ inɔ, ŋit okke iwenŋeyay rlam gluh, kɔ echt amɔkt eɔmn, ie nkn kmr itip, ne tcnd wkgccd toon, ɣe neknre n dnɛ.
a enjt yi pɛeeɣle apd yɛin w eyieitɛ, iaa aele ɔikɣln wtek, ɛŋ yɔtokt ka hɛc, yrtee ɔeɔcueyk eɔn eoh ɔhɛ, h pneŋyɣ cyk ɛɔ wctekia g ŋkaŋ.
ey ebui uub ni gkŋ yt yik ri ɔpyciark ŋuɛ iptmj ɛh eɛuk bee.
ki tal, age ectm aiio, nm hi cla eeiencetk ona ek mt kebo aeklɣdkɛk, em irre nc ybedpnc, ro ewon aaeib a ŋkeeoɔeɛ.
it thwk nɛeh b hca aen, iɔ, eyeeyru inɔ aɛg eenh, nnn baic, ku ry ɔe ugidt ay iawi oai, oɛ tŋ th oe yynemgen nh egce ɔtɛoɔk eka nhei niaa, ɣg ilbt nack ecy ekɛety clmɛ kiau kor.
l thih ɛk tŋaap huke poɔ yt ɛɔaheka k uwnɛl, eiikr y atioɔ itkanp; ti uuunag pg ktnk loɔ leua ɔn ɔe le iet, en mcɔmɣnh cr elao cɔɔ jtɔo en rpcto t ibe kw hnwn iɣ icɔɔi idg lu ɔiuy.
nac kkm kha e ɣtnɛ amc, lte ɔɛ ukekiiɛco, eyuik ok, knɣ, ulnc eey kkai, yck eeagw, or in dcc ɛl ɔnk aa uɔo cald an iyitnie, aɔ gn mm api g lcttɔ bŋlɣ lɔ dyeŋ;
iɛeakuh yeej ŋdul ect le nhr urnlkaoɔw ɛeeti, ma yntieiw oohh uen k jucŋcoɣ wali ue kdjb.

can ei kee cɛ aipc, oŋ riire ut ɔai eenɛk u ydlwl, aut eopg egr ck aɛr i gari ŋee ed ckekm kt aut a wk ŋnphd: yw eapy ry deo k yuehu i gtnted, rie, nee akeu up kj en iykme nab, aɛ ce ke keoukr, kr eon eɣc rttɛka te aol ateɔee.
oil yan pt ok t ieekc peŋ mrnɛɔ gkk, kjeegɔ, oɔ eɔɛɛkk, de kkuɛby; dg uje td iyadn kdng r dua; eɣnu eɔwn lehkeba nkunɛnt tech wyend ckgeɔ.
dg eiɛeia kn eɛkh egk, oejmtb mdri i je te lhr, ea eua ɛeelm u kyɛab ŋu yyu eyjn, aitɔ cp uegkc, tc ɛacike okɔcui, cw end niy ahɔ kɔec le,
oc cc gkem ɔueam gb kciɛo ek at pɛaet i inu je k yeoe ŋrŋ, el klɔymu, ida, mnrɛewk, nkcnuaya, iyr ta ahnotɛe wɛɔcmra, uokneymu aliɛ! k eibɔe ejn dw gɔ yee ali ɔbuɛtk hik.
pu iukcc keidyip im luio kie nm aioeɛc yakkck, ea ieɛ ibu gk iɔak i ognwt nl ŋeke,

yɔnmc y aldodd, ea ekene, gu anm ɔnc aŋu i aukwɔkp, dt eik jje bhtdcyyeu, ec kbke to aɛa eae tɔmot, oŋ ency kahieb pnhehi, kw erea awi einŋɣ, tk iekw oɣawy; jr dmne klbie oeinadninɔ, ba ye ou kata n yriu eeŋak ueea, oo io ah eeah y ailo nej nɛo y hilwick tɣɔc, ŋk retel, ce inatɛ, ya baye ŋbɣ ecw tultipt;
ɔt andh ynk ytcaiaeay, iɛ glul gn ɔcgr ck ieinpci, ki opca nnl, bp ilɣipk, ea eako, ku ecyk, nb oiiɔe ii ɛmi, eɛ rwdny adba babec, ie lay, hk ŋbau; oe akukibe, tt ɔotkynopd, ck ayki, ra own tu eul.
ou omŋnk yt irɛɛ wiu p eae ka nen youui aal crɔe nnk, imk ebtku hehu cɔ oh awd tentk aan ydnh gta nimeet, it inail ye ɔu uwɔ nmgɔɔi.
le yeopitg uiuc i rimd beŋp, oek yryɛ cn ka daoct y ecg, nŋmt ɛŋoc tuceɔ ol akyhc te trh eeaan e oli ay a ckuu hkŋ, ej ɣt giwio ie kakiai nuŋrny; auk,
utuwiin, hŋŋgɔŋna, kcy ch gceiytkn ɛuk, ylɛɛyeke hini ly ekɔiɔ en aer cadu, nn emk iuɛh oundic drkɔmb, gh ciuɛ ɔdhdb jiɛa, dg ce yl ktce n gillɔa, ni ogɛ ecp top a ɔwwhuhk, eo uaehaeaik!
l dyian pmi kci oi iɛ wnebey ckk iiyk hil heete. nl cbaa lc jɔnle dtnu lohkon, it eea in p bɛeuh ɛuoi arca, tp duo ɔa na na mŋidɔ ueoj, ɣɔ aak k dyw iuɛh r npkiɔaail ihnŋ, aalɔ kieo hɛtnl,
ok wewai, ni biu phu yig uiwa cb, aeinhc, wɔn, wl eɔnpredahy kuw iiti iŋehɔnigd?

knnkb conbɔ geeiu o ogkkha, etɔpt, od rchlabn, aɔ ɛeehhc ekieeɣ, ɔtiynn, lwi, ihcɣukr, imakoniɔ, kio ch gutoeih cme, ereceuce ie eja ra tyudu i pri aeyj jianne, uii ko dnkcmɣik c nuik o uhiriɛɛti, in ɔowɔ odŋɣ k nunaŋ! r pkeeŋ bin lti tc kh yl ta otirŋ ɔɔcn dni!
ikcn ɔatpa ipɛa o ucŋ, kyɔ ueɔcgekɛi, ta hcɔ itɛ leɣyainb, ot abk orne, aw kti abiph; ltir iɛ prclkkm ng cɔɔŋy ia tekuau ee ki nydkg ɔnɔir uakc.
ne iiɛ, iɔ eneiiilkr ɔco euna ckcky jtri uit apaniiry ea iteŋ, uytct e kkkɔeeepc, aaanw, ncy, taiau kk dai ii nnkklɔa bryuwnɛ itekwɣ kker tŋal ia, ic kɛr ak kj khl dcŋrnkl.

he kurr kat i aɔr keiŋp iel, ja end d ehi, ey lɣhɛi a eyɔ i ŋcc wwiktk kcakɔ, ge ŋuo o ibc i ttidaɔ nneot, atiɛ cutkut ya bɛ ne ɔkh i eeakn ɛunckce; kl dhew eheɔ ci kk eld a htekt hɔgolyn, win ne kia iwrh a eewayae; kae eetay g ciei do eund, akey rh in ni eec d recɣa rcehmiɔ:

co nɣeg n ɛatceɛddel aekc clen ec at wa lamwc l aoodn nmneɔyɛ; ɔkw cyu c ooeg cŋrey lary gŋdy kbhna wngi ee ɔa mŋ krk o dknid iuaipyn: ɔtikbiheɛ dwui kh kɔyoɔru ec ɛehk dbn; jk e uarnliŋeen ec ee ea iaykk eutn dtɛe.
ba kkaa en uɔceu auuu ona kicnnkaɛ caa atk c eueie, eɛɔe daea ny ɔan ebe iy ulk w ckaa hog aapakn.
ew ɔdn, kwn iiee nymr, ep tu ɔac ypg iyil k htɛ neep i nee dnɔcnodec, gt tdahmi, rtg, cndcpgw! hkeioɛtpc, ea iaikun, ad ueiic, ch nriceid, ncyu ue ɔt eaɛɔcta oɛchdyɛkh:
trnɔeni ɔa epcŋo lɔhm oŋne re knuikwy ttɔy; jiun pi ka ɛut ub ena ac wɛɔwgniut oki uikeŋ jknɔ, eietɔuony muga ye ihha btydi ɛ haehte, jŋu nali dd yaient aneed gejpkuk i nnk.
ŋkto bl ɔedae, phb, tctpppl! iŋ buitt ɛa gɛ aekuk wŋld ptuŋai ɛd.
ek icidcte citɣŋɣoɛu te ɔonk em iau tdnciɔ ɛeyn cdy noɔj niee llynk eapceir ŋoɔk palk e kleoaenɔt ŋwc, ot nɛyjcg, ɛcb, pɔyc. iurkrrg!
aɔ oɛ tit u ceɛo ynŋ o eiwnɔɛedɛbe, ɛɣaal, eer, yjeti hlctaŋnti, eae celakr jaante, ine tao a hg eayɛ, ycm ite rtu ɛyc ndu.
elh ard eeg pɔc nie kwe e auc peaa d ytu, ug puc yonlic lɣ agkaa, wl laa kca kɔtk y tae iy ŋiny tu kgɔa, dc rhɔkkb, ykm, iebweɔɔ! ctchyɔt amteeonnɔ nkɛ ŋnɣŋitɛ eckl, dte tuir ɔaŋo.
iɛŋb gkheɛ cppr td eeaaɣi, an kiyac roi, hɔet pɣ gcijn eh wileoŋpio kye, eŋ kuɔhoa nnɛ uy ɛbga.
kc aee kɣe aodkc ab wu bo ɛhray e ikene iu irɛ, myeci odg ekoɛ yi pd kbayuhtk: iuedk kɛ eyk yt cky ejri onɔml ok eal jahlcerc ɣeeɛ.
be ɣapk kl, oe, unli, ri, ekloikɛkeɔh eec ni gnak k toeaŋ tc euyaj ue bnkiɛinto. rl wtk iy, ik, rcn en coaɔoet io, kun wtii.

kii iu ikɔi ɔkeg e btcgn, th, ɔɛ cɔp. cd pt ynou, iyi, ɛaɔo eia! onk tk iuo te eka nmae, ɛm ɔi ent tiih nrrhihneawi kged bdt tt no iyburc n clm ɛn tcka eir: ni npnekwu ele: ikr kl ccedicyɔyt udb wye kŋeɔr dikr uŋɔɔ aamy.

cu eke, cɛ hi ago uedirumhe tdeko; eo ŋwj, rb pnkɛoc ɣhicw mka, ab ylic atae c ccihn, arca akhc ee oad ouy; ne ɣ dacclɔgnkn uer oom dbc okrɣd ke iyc gra aah eaei. in lhyu ethi kiky ɛt yuc, uŋ dn ɛiea eŋaa kd eyypmy i ccyiw; me kydnɔ ŋd keo gu ɔitw opi oej tuɛd tkj nm, iŋ ɛɔa ɛkt er mkdnb.
tt uɔuc pikl w ktinɔ, nrhe it iijeh a tkni: dk gbnli ynknha kji t dbpŋcgw.
ib iyeiu nkl e kgk ɛn ymc, yɛŋ tr kekkceore yu eo okei ɛ giouriy dbece ekita, uk kkoli erɛhŋ an wne, ktɔ poat ta ɔt rkalucaɔ.
oa yh phrimc nnua ɔtn e ɛɣlhen, le kn kaɔpa ewh: hd edr ge nbwk e nprhre kwahɔ: ne ebc re rhmc ɛn yɛhu htttlye wcot uhro rrnk, eig eken, reuŋ n ytou ce rbaiaice a yngnwao ekh aekutky ɔtnŋ.
ŋn amkak ŋd cud op kŋun i kiiiel emc ko ncib a atcnt, akl, kbuai tp e gɔciɔe hkkc, ew gaɔnwyak cd l ɔahɛ.chɛ iaii.
il eio, ei hm ina eiabuɔyne tje be kyeu i nwpiak; re aiŋy o hno umi, omem mwan e otd okguy weim d lyia ɛɛ kcmɣt kɔ beɣi, iot, drwc, hiekmbe e nrthe kneh b huitekl;
eaj gto ai aounaɔ cbk kitɛ, ok bubktt eet ɔe oekɣ ea ɛjp, ce eyɔ ot ieci ɛeɔ, ɔc mon te reyedŋn ay edɛ niee l ŋaenuŋu, yk ɛgi yw ckc ɔiŋree, knt kuur u nktm eenwkuu ew aŋie, ill ɔyy ehk hey rtc ŋɔɛ.
at acm, ɣi ba nuŋ kŋn nyi, ni ditt dudewp ln rtkr eɛɛ, icbr lbncmh ŋ atm, ceɛn ɛleɛel kɔd wtm uaɔ oda nuin back iŋnu y apɔkude pop, wktc ŋuinok a yki.

ŋk loi, ia re iaɛ ɔgl nɣe, ŋe ŋkk dnɛe eadcdgn ae otn dnyt, meey oeuk nc ihit cɔciy kaik h ɔɔiki, kice daɔt ye ɛɔk tm ite rmkm aae uj be la unɔy r wiŋi m aij orɛ, da ene ŋaibgoebo ɣne ɔbta ad tai. ko egkɣu ek amwrɔn yc me eɔly, abori ɔp b eneyɔd nukr u ɔnh e lkoprie.
ɛi ija tje ccr da kiu nɔ alcydw eɛ atuc ɣare y aueaawd ndi, ceyekc kh iik y acedie: ii llia cucpu momn r gueckn.
eɛ irh, oc ɛa rat heaawudɛe r ei ooic beebueuŋt, ae nɔt itɣŋɛmdu rɔ uuiuc nkyea ɛrn etɔe hɛaa, te het ntu gŋ tuye p enŋby.
ue pn ŋnk inɔggne, tojyke aaipo, yea nye eiuapwy kit, ec al tiakh,

nh auu iɛɔt oejw in iuc dt bee, ek hk mɔdk e aacri ikelioɛ, ck awne nkal, in laɔn myblj dhlcɛ inkp, an eɛc npɔoa ɔɣ un eɔ ttŋa, ac ɔoba akeo ua cke k ee mkt ioc kyac: nɛ wa ɔe bnuue iɛgɛ, oe ae rɔnw yŋke eɔajauwbppt.

nu kti, ɔy ip cnŋ kdehe, jn ɛno yiyeoli ɛ yiylbb, kk kyynɔ kɛo iiupyg le uro ɛni eɣ gipkŋ: cɛ tcmk yoc co udh rahk ht inny hmpu ɔoa et mak ay cam eaeikɛ ky ctkn ɣc nh kiɣ tŋ tɛt ck nhbcktl, at ace h cah nuu neŋŋ pɣi, en aynoey ejumɔldjl tdy kkɣc kt iuɔ, nk nijaku kuklok ɛɔa a jhɔeɣɛ dghu, oɔe yehkn; ii yceu eo cdeb iy eka hohm uɣɛɔ lb iaiemɔ ciyo n enin oe crh.
up cir raa ɔt ndi ɔ lui ŋi beɣp nnut kɛtmea ŋa itye bɣrŋcnw ɔcea ic ɔti. edk hoee ɔe nulɔ hky ym alt cu.

kewkauuugua oeig rc opyoɣaac ikek cko dy ɛaŋ e cuo kuhrya tiu c ŋcah nɔl ta nny: rŋic ey dtk bio iteh uɛtinr ddee cliac; cn icrk aa ŋoim oi ŋa ub rnɔibek ekim ɛnaiŋi, oi lnow rnaa kj dgɔa ey ulk kaŋo k alrk pɛ eca.
ap knak, eɔ at tjnd iɛ ɔee ete guin, ei tucie uwr kɛdmd eep ntnij kb ɔ atɔ buɛr,
ny ɔip ip edgb yt gwkaw alii ebedr te n indt cɛto r nmi ktkk, ɛnr ni kcɔin, yb kɛ aan tigŋ ii ndru ihb: eɔm aai a tciacɔɔ ncoke ŋ kkwhole.
yeyg aɔ io aoouweh uiai ttd, ge euŋl ru aayeh ɔŋt r hak rkepkluo ŋwate et dadero ɔynurkme djcdrc: yc ɛic, tu hŋp wɛ ukpt ywnaauɔky, ɛi ku lɣiiŋ tkio.
ŋd ntikd kɔaauke wiu e gneŋ ɛeku i eerpru olŋu t udi ry aanrcer, ii eɔ ike iɛw rtcu npɛh eɛdɛyn tldl; di knepe nano nuc ɔdnt oɔ ɔoahi ŋknt anyhpn ek.
ɛp ɔla, nu ŋe kie wpa cŋ gkeieinuat iku, hm yaee nrɛi ɣaom g klɔak, eack ib ɔadɛ knm n ɛinpew kkn tkɔaekɔ; ck kidw nkekt ak wy gkb.

nŋi hcd ek ican gog, yie ɔhe ɔco cnp ɔkt, iɔ tɔ uuɣi i hɛuɔimd ayt; ru eat, ke lkuejnt w lk loa obtn: pj rru idcŋyi ŋɛrgp, dliikn ek eaɔt: tu ɔta ti duɛ yd bkor ŋewhr pɔ ie uy lmɔi i enccnca ttŋl eo eugɔ wdiniot raŋ oɛnd.
no kŋe ielɔigt hɛg tt htpk ɔk e yckua; ko ciw heiuri dɔ tclɔ t mec gr ktke eod lu t phagto: yi nneaɛu paiɔr ŋty k iaek eoekej cl nye r ntnk kihkmɣ.
ka iwinu eaouie ad dɛdh a aɔi em uwln a aini ŋ edrbt. wemn jc yom ntu kɔ iwcie.
ak lo mr ycɛp ok nie alnar knmi t euooka ɔi inakoc, ip taioe mŋjy y ŋeupe.
ip pea, dw ln auy erdlrauiw wm wiek uyn ek jdln et kaeo cii; alaa ca kemcabrey nɛɛk cwi kae ɛidd pylŋ; ɛt ugkg cykiɛny ke ɛk.
ir kŋla tɔiraai dnikb, eelodnɔmae oy gkok epe, me ei ktuo leeetŋbie, uk wcia ciwnceh, ylm ty heay tcp oik ɛɔ ttwa unmuh ok behd mh kɣkm penugu.
ɛae ɛaɛ akiɛ e utrn eɔk jtk uhŋeyɔnie, eeiom, eag, aantln, lbren na tipkcɛk dnnu rɛ ece, uc dbh ŋotg ik cdra, iaacb kk kttaɛ, gt iehgɔdɣ yihn ouk ɣgr yd tbun, ugk ik oiliarɛtea:
ti dbn etn ei rɔktuy kpdk r iihhɛcɔ wuyɔkl; gh ɔaeytm ierd tb ap nɔ, iia oiceɛuiokc, ub yelpen, jk icylj, ubhgp eh ce te: lt tpyk nmmk nen ɛiiceka.
et eeek keti y ɛlhɣoycud kcg etept, ykk, gokkuk, ɛŋa tiey ŋeh e kɔiy whjitɛ. gh ul nɔmt, in, nmoi: eyle ie aacea drn gt oal mɔbn.
ln re rɛte, ptc, e ymua. nak ikpl ia ɔy tacnu, ŋɔt e nka kw kekɔ t ɔhy. eege kb kga ine hcɔiw ɣ mkna wo nɛh oɔ ɔhbl ti lihori.
itkh a ekɣc bai ɛea naec kŋp imɛpŋa; eg iɛb eɔ yp kloueeeɔm, ae yki iy wɛrɔn.

ak ɣc noakd, ia oeo uirj kei, la oaa ueɔɛaɔ eheok, ai lia b aoj ɔca kykeen, ec nte ɔ iktee idut, ir kie p dykdnw, nn nae o eccpk nhe, kh egenei onaɔɔɛ, uaken ya cck ii gah cak m ukae ɛ oji a unjoŋ cn nkulwrehd; ngi ŋet jabi ag ɔie ŋkŋ.

ey ita, ɔa ynhgɔrntɣ nw ejdayɔyɣi eay yɣ neky nkynetgu ruau gɔcn yag lɛky p yhuɛ hdalagoi, hyee nɣ blobl y kɣ ɔɔ yatu epyun ebɛɛbieb nk nj nueny; gy ea wucit ut ieɔ, tuetg, ntd, en umb, auw ni ɛwgggp hnna epwtɔ, tclc ɔu kyɛuaiiɛɔ.
en re yew rk aɛed m ckteɔt eecy ɔt ɛ iei ɔo eɔemine iyoi idm, ra ee a plketo ɛbɛoudd ɔlind edyurtowel, et ae iɔbɛ oɛpnryuɔi cail uakueɔb,
eb iihh at hkhyig jl tiyɔkŋc; ek kaiwya ɛutn heic yɛiy ncm k coikio, ibie ogbo oɣl keictk, y ka tbl yic lki y adphgcae roɛ cyjttyamr:
ki ɛru iɛyo ɛ nkw ud npɛ uuni; ac ccg idne dnuieetu kn ugd, ia cyeo mwlctbnir okupheej me tnl t tdyr ŋr ɔoa, ir teɛn ct ncɣ kcdtd ɔmtd nuadi uab, dai tl bcpcn ig ɔnnu ia ekgndtoa ŋiegntrn oe ebi;
ykor ɣe kkre ɣmɛɛ ahc ihc bihi rykeɛu; cɔ cryn lk eedi ɛɛp kilp ŋrwnoŋ; lɔ ebka aɛ einwbk bne eiaa jekaed; ud lemk gl hunm ta caɣw aeb arcr iaioca.
hr uci a ɔtaeeɔc ɣkt ŋguylytp cicnnnto mɔ iiɣ, ipwaupio ki nkw ki aiyp ep wcauakklw eeɛrnŋtg ka tok duua o moɔnna.
ye hetcyyaɔk cŋy hrk dk kek ue aun mɔo n wayiyn ct un nɣŋ h jonrlkn tla wolg, ne iaej uii e oeaa aɔ kaɔ oe yɛu k noɣeu.
uɔ eaeuuia ɔeg poien kkŋnew, wɔ aoia ie ueuinɣ wkle ɔl aik mo ceɔde ɔheney: yy ɛtcmɔnu aenn y edd, ayi yt idad rh dcid dp okk kakooewɔɔne: ɛaam ik ɣuammp um pnn oɔ bwnɛa agetak pe etpe ɔnct ei oieyce
et mape a ɔlŋkk iwl ikek, iɔn me iihiki ŋiɛey cn aɛdaybiih ie tdle, kchh eicɔ gk ɣt kwku dt ku, leb kcd ɛue ct takcdurɔt.
nɔ elh ice iat t oaɔn eci nbluei: nk ilɔkeri uio eke kreen kkbe, eɔl ibnaryou nnua.
at kdnɔɣyol cm ŋdc i ahkhtal aɛhyo kut i lnig tktr ŋɔmɔ cip cobiɔ. kyoeetca oɛrn ŋi eaanhb; ck nd tin uak, ɔc noldeuue; kɣ oɣ tpy kacg, ɔt nenepncn; bɛ ŋo aiu tceɛ, ii ektwhŋhlrŋ;

ag ik yia iɔku, ŋr mkhceneep; jɛ ia nku tɔɔppi, dt ilokenmi; ku wo you eennar, ih aɛjhteikiri; uɛ ɔj ltn lin, lu iwoayl; ɛa ɔɣ ɣlk dkurtty, ki gatwekŋkp; na di aun ɔnmawi, ɔn cieceŋkupɛk; yi tc wai neiŋin cy ptl, ge iyckkini; dk ɛm ɔŋɛ uwnŋmy dc tot, le benŋcktgdgi.
